S04n411:1: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitad abhavat |
S04n411:2: “bahyo'nena samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena prāṇakoṭyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikabhūmau sthāpitāste ca mayā vyākartavyā buddhakṣetrāśca darśayitavyāḥ“ |
S04n411:3: atha khalu bhagavān bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ |
S04n411:5: yena smitāviṣkaraṇenānantā paryantā buddhakṣetrā udareṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya rājño'raṇemino'nyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ prāṇakoṭināṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ ādarśayati |
S04n411:6: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśasu dikṣu gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ tamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhānubhāvenemāṃ lokadhātuṃ samāgatā bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca |
S04n411:7: te ca vividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ paryupāsya purato niṣaṇṇā bodhisattvapraṇidhānaṃ śrotukāmāḥ |
S04n411:8: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo'grapurohitaḥ rājānamaraṇeminamāha - “tvaṃ tāvan mahārāja prathamaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva“ |
S04n411:9: atha rājānaṇemī yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “ahaṃ bhagavan bodhyarthikaḥ,
S04n411:10: yanmayā māsatrayaṃ bhagavato nānāvidhairupakaraṇairupasthānaṃ kṛtamaprameyasya ca bhikṣusaṅghasya tanmayā kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitaṃ |
S04n411:11: imāni ca bhagavan mayā saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāścintitā;
S04n411:12: yatrāhaṃ bhagavan buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yatra na nirayā syurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ |
S04n411:15: sarveṣāṃ tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ na syāt |
S04n411:17: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa divyena cakṣuṣā samanvāgatāḥ syuryad buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ ca deśayataḥ paśyeyuḥ |
S04n411:22: sarvasattvāḥ tathāvidhenarddhikauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ syuryadekacittotpādena buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi atikrameyuḥ |
S04n411:23: mā ca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ parigrahavanto'ntataḥ svaśarīre'pyanāgṛhītamānasāḥ |
S04n411:27: na tatra sattvānāṃ āyuḥ pramāṇaparyantaḥ syād,
S04n411:36: yāvad vividhena bodhisattvavikurvitenākāṅkṣeyuḥ buddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathaiva teṣāṃ siddhyeyuḥ,
S04n411:40: na kaścit sattvo buddhakṣetraguṇālaṅkārasya varṇaparyantaṃ śaktaḥ syādgṛhītumantaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā |
S04n411:46: ye cātra sattvā upapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparyantena brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ |
S04n411:51: sarvasattvāśca tatra navāni vastrāṇi kāśāyāṇi dhārayeyuḥ |
S04n411:52: sahopapannāśca tatra sattvāḥ suvibhaktivatīṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:53: yasya samādheḥ pratilābhādgaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā buddhān paryupasīran yāvad bodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ |
S04n411:54: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā upapadyeyuḥ te yādṛgjātīyāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛgjātīyān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ teṣu ratnavṛkṣeṣu paśyeyuḥ |
S04n411:55: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuryasya samādheḥ pratilābhāt daśasu dikṣu gaṇanātikrānteṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāstiṣṭhato yāpayato nityaṃ paśyeyurye tatra sattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ te sarva evaṃrūpeṇa cīvaravimānālaṅkārābharaṇavarṇarūpeṇa syuryathā paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ |
S04n411:56: na tatra buddhakṣetre pāṃśuśilā kālaparvatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:59: tatra narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdo na syānnākṣaṇaśabdo na duḥkhaśabdaḥ |
S04n411:61: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvaduṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣye yāvannaivaṃrūpairguṇairbuddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣye;
S04n411:66: apramāṇā ca me prabhā syāt buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ avabhāsayanti |
S04n411:67: aparimāṇā ca mamāyurbhavedaprameyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ na śakyaṃ kenacid gaṇayitumanyatra sārvajñena jñānena |
S04n411:69: yanna śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena |
S04n411:70: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇabhāṣaṇaṃ kuryurghoṣaṃ cānuśrāvayeyuryaśa udīrayeyuḥ |
S04n411:71: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste sarve buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ,
S04n411:73: bodhiprāptasya me'nyāsu gaṇanātikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu sattvā bodhicittotpādaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04n411:77: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ prasādaṃ ca mamāntika utpādayeyuḥ,
S04n411:80: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāste'smākaṃ sakāśādaśrutapūrvāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotuṃ te yādṛśīmākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ śṛṇuyuḥ |
S04n411:81: bodhiprāptasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te'vaivartikāḥ syuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n411:83: yādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ |
S04n411:84: parinirvṛtasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu paścād gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā paramāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ ca prāpnuyurmāmeva namasyamānā āścaryaprāptā yaśakīrtiṃ ca varṇayeyuḥ;
S04n411:85: bodhisattvabhūtena ca yadā mayā buddhakāryaṃ abhiniṣpāditaṃ tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,
S04n411:86: abhisaṃbuddhasya ca mama paramaprasādapratilabdhā bodhisattvāḥ prathamāyāḥ kṣāntyā lābhinaḥ syurdvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ,
S04n411:87: yādṛśīṃ ca samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:89: bodhiprāptasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyustāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:92: parinirvṛtasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu gaṇanātikrāntā yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ tāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ prasādaṃ ca prāpnuyuḥ,
S04n411:98: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño'raṇeminaḥ sādhukāramadāt |
S04n411:100: gambhīraste mahārāja praṇidhānaṃ pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ |
S04n411:101: paśya mahārāja paścimāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ atikramya indrasuvirājitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04n411:102: tatrendraghoṣeśvararājo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n411:103: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptirapyasti,
S04n411:107: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmasya nāmāpi jñāyate |
S04n411:108: sarva ete guṇāstatra buddhakṣetre yathā mahārājenāparimitaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānam kṛtamamitāśayāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstena tvaṃ mahārāja indraghoṣeśvararājatathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya tasmin saddharme'ntarhite ṣaṣṭīnāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sā lokadhāturmeruprabhā nāma bhaviṣyati |
S04n411:110: yathaivendraghoṣeśvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya indrasuvirājitāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ tathaivācintyamatiguṇarājasya tathāgatasya meruprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau guṇavyūho bhaviṣyati |
S04n411:112: yadācintyamatiguṇarājastathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya ṣoḍaśāntarakalpāḥ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
S04n411:113: tasya saddharme'ntarhite sahasrāntarakalpātyayena viratirnāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati |
S04n411:117: evaṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ saddharme'ntarhite aparā nāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati |
S04n411:118: tara ratneśvaraghoṣo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpatsyate |
S04n411:119: samo buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ samaṃ cāntarakalpā sthāsyati yāpayiṣyati dharmaṃ ca deśayiṣyati |
S04n411:123: evaṃ cāprameyāparimāṇān tathāgatāṃstatra buddhakṣetra upapannān paśyāmi parinirvṛtāṃśca,
S04n411:125: tatrānāgate'dhvani atikrānta ekasmin gaṅgāvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatī nāma bhaviṣyati |
S04n411:128: rājāraṇemyāha - “kutra te bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ tatra buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante?“ |
S04n411:129: bhagavān āha - “ime te mahārāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye'prameyairasaṃkhyeyairatulyairaparimāṇairdaśabhyo digbhyaḥ tābhyastābhyo lokadhātubhya āgatā maṃ vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04n411:130: ye mama purato niṣaṇṇā ete'tītairbuddhairvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n411:131: pratyutpannairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirete kulaputrā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n411:133: ekaikaścaiṣa mahārāja bodhisattvo'nekeṣāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ antike kṛtādhikāro'varuptakuśalamūlo bhāvitaprajñaḥ,
S04n411:134: ta ete mahārāja kulaputrā ye tatra prathamataraṃ buddhakṣetre buddhā bhaviṣyanti“ |
S04n411:135: rājāraṇemyāha - “ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yenāhaṃ sapariṣatko'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ sa kiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate ?“ |
S04n411:138: rājā āha - “yadyeṣa me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyati yathāhaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtāḥ,
S04n411:139: tadyathāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādavandanaṃ kuryāṃ pañcamaṇḍalena tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ prakampantu pracalantu |
S04n411:140: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti te ca māṃ vyākuryuḥ“ |
S04n411:141: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādayornipatitaḥ |
S04n411:142: yadaiva rājñaḥ śirasā pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrāḥ kampitāḥ calitāḥ pracalitāḥ kṣubhitāḥ saṃprakṣubhitāḥ,
S04n411:144: “santīraṇe buddhakṣetre dhāraṇe kalpe'śītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ratnagarbhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānamaraṇeminaṃ vyākaroti |
S04n411:145: bhaviṣyasi tvamanāgate'dhvani atikrānte gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye praviṣṭe dvitīye'saṃkhyeye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvamitaśuddhāyāṃ amitāyurnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04n411:146: samantato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn avabhāsayiṣyasi“ |
S04n411:152: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī tuṣṭa udagraḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S04n411:154: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājño'raṇemino jyeṣṭhaputramanimiṣaṃ nāma rājakumāramāmantrayati sma |
S04n411:157: “avalokitā mayāpāyā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ pracaṇḍaghoraṃ duḥkhaṃ anubhavanti |
S04n411:158: avalokitā mayā svargā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ saṃkliṣṭacittāḥ punarapyapāyeṣu prapatanti |
S04n411:162: sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n411:163: yad ahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ ye kecanasattvā duḥkhotpīḍā bhayatarjitā dharmadurbhikṣāndhakāre praviṣṭā līnā dīnā atrāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā māmanusmareyuḥ,
S04n411:165: yadyahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śṛṇuyāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyeyaṃ,
S04n411:166: na ca tāṃ sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ,
S04n411:168: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sattvahetościrapraṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa ciraṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi tadā me āśāparipūrirbhavatu |
S04n411:169: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahārājāraṇemī atikrānte ekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04n411:171: pariśuddhe buddhakṣetre pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
S04n411:172: yāvatyāmitāyustathāgataḥ aparimāṇān kalpān buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā pariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryo'nupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyate,
S04n411:173: tasya praviṣṭasya yāvat saddharmaḥ sthāsyati tāvacciramahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi,
S04n411:175: yadāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya rātryāḥ prathame yāme saddharmo'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ |
S04n411:177: evamevāhaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti tān api buddhān bhagavataḥ svareṇa vijñapayāmi vyākurvantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
S04n411:179: evaṃ cāha - “yattvayā kulaputrāvalokitā apāyāḥ avalokitāḥ svargā avalokitaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃjanitaṃ kāruṇyacittaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanārthaṃ kleśapraśamanārthaṃ,
S04n411:184: yasyāmeva rātryāṃ prathame yāme saddharmo'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme tvaṃ kulaputrānekavyūhe bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04n411:188: avalokiteśvara āha - “yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ,
S04n411:189: calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S04n411:192: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu dharaṇī pracalitā,
S04n411:193: te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
S04n411:201: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa |
S04n411:203: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmaya,
S04n411:205: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - “yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04n411:207: yacca kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n411:208: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ;
S04n411:209: yatrāvalokiteśvaraḥ kumāraḥ sarvaratnasannicayāyāṃ lokadhātāvanekaratnavyūhe bodhivṛkṣe niṣaṇṇo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate samantaraśmyabhudgataśrīkūṭarājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati,
S04n411:210: tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ,
S04n411:216: sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya“ |
S04n411:218: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ yathā svayaṃ parigṛhītaṃ |
S04n411:219: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputra tasmin buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ |
S04n411:224: tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena kāyena pādau vandāmi tadā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu,
S04n411:226: yadā kulaputra mahāsthāmaprāptena satpuruṣeṇa ratnagarbhasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhirvyākṛtaḥ,
S04n411:236: pratigṛhyāñjaliṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - “yanmayā bhagavān sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04n411:243: daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ |
S04n411:244: ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitā yeṣāṃ mayā tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04n411:245: pāramitāsu ca ye mayā samādāpitā niveśitā pratiṣṭhāpitā bodhicaryāṃ caratā,
S04n411:246: tān ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālikāsame buddhakṣetre paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato dharman deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ,
S04n411:249: tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ sattvānāmāśayapariśodhayamānaḥ yāvantaḥ kecit sattvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran ta evaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ tadyathā brahmakāyikā devāḥ;
S04n411:250: tathā ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ syāt |
S04n411:251: tasya ca buddhakṣetrasya bhavāgraparyantāni prākārāṇi anekaratnasaṃsthitāni nānāratnapratyuptāni ca syuḥ,
S04n411:252: sarvā ca tatra buddhakṣetre śuddhavaiḍūryamayī pṛthivī syāt,
S04n411:255: sarvasattvāścopapādukāḥ syurna tatra sattvāḥ kavadīkārāhārāḥ syuḥ,
S04n411:256: sarve ca tatra sattvā prītyāhārā dharmāhārāḥ syuḥ |
S04n411:257: na tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptiḥ syāt,
S04n411:258: śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapagatakhilamaladveṣamrakṣāṇāṃ śuddhānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ syāt |
S04n411:259: sarve tatra bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastradhāriṇaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:261: teṣāṃ dakṣiṇe haste ratnapātrī nānārasapūrṇā prādurbhavet;
S04n411:262: samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyurnāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ ye vayaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāramāharema,
S04n411:263: yannūnaṃ vayamanyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato'nenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmo buddhaśrāvakāṃśca duḥkhitaṃ ca janaṃ pratimānayāmaḥ,
S04n411:264: pretabhavaneṣu ca gatvā kṣuttarṣaprajvalitagātrān sattvān anenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmaḥ“ |
S04n411:265: sahacittotpādena te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā acintyacāritravatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:266: tasya ca samādheḥ pratilābhādasajjanā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaccheyuḥ,
S04n411:267: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavata āhāreṇa pratimānayeyuḥ śrāvakāṃścānyāṃśca sattvāṃ,
S04n411:268: prītyā pratimānya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svabuddhakṣetraṃ āgaccheyuḥ |
S04n411:270: yāvat tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svakaṃ buddhakṣetramāgatyānyonyaṃ cīvareṇa prāvarayeyuḥ |
S04n411:271: yāvanti ca tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmupabhogaḥ paribhogā bhaveyustaiḥ sarvairbuddhaiḥ śrāvakaiścānyaiśca sattvaiḥ sahasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā paścādātmanā paribhuñjeyuḥ |
S04n411:278: yāni maṇiratnāni daśasu dikṣvadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi tāni aśrutapūrvāṇi tāni maṇiratnāni pracareyuḥ,
S04n411:279: yeṣāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ nāmadheye nirdiśyamāne varṣakoṭyo'pi kṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ |
S04n411:280: yaśca bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣeta svarṇamayaṃ eva buddhakṣetraṃ paśyeyaṃ tasya svarṇamayaṃ eva tiṣṭheta |
S04n411:284: ya ākāṅkṣeta sphatikamayaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ aśmagarbhamayaṃ lohitamuktāmayaṃ musālagalvamayaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ paśyema,
S04n411:286: agarumayaṃ tagaramayaṃ tamālapatramayaṃ yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣeduragasāracandanamayaṃ goṣīrṣacandanamayaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭuṃ tasya tathaiva syāt |
S04n411:287: yathā yathā yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathā tathā tādṛśaṃ syāt;
S04n411:290: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sūryacandramasau prajñāyeyātāṃ,
S04n411:294: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre rātridivasānāṃ nāmadheyamapi prajñāyate,
S04n411:296: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śītoṣṇaṃ prajñāyate na vyādhirna glānyaṃ na jarāmaraṇamanyatra yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣedbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ so'nyatra lokadhātāvuṣitvā āyuḥ kṣapayitvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta |
S04n411:300: sarvatra ca buddhakṣetre gaganatale tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrā vādyeyuḥ |
S04n411:301: na ca tebhyastūryebhyaḥ kāmopasaṃhitāḥ śabdā niścareyuḥ,
S04n411:305: bodhisattvacārikāmahaṃ bhagavaṃścaramāṇo yāvan mayāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā dṛṣṭāste vyūhāste'laṅkārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tāni sthānāni tāni praṇidhānāni sarva eva mama buddhakṣetre praviśeyuḥ,
S04n411:307: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre narakatiryakpretāḥ prajñāyeyurna sumerurna cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na śīlāpāṃśuparvatāḥ prajñāyeyuḥ,
S04n411:310: anyatra divyaiḥ kusumairmāndāravamahāmāndāravairna ca tatra durgandhaṃ syānnānāgandhairudārodāraistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt |
S04n411:314: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvannaivaṃvidhaṃ mahāpuruṣakāramabhiniṣpādayiṣyāmi |
S04n411:316: evaṃrūpaiḥ śuddhāśayaiḥ sattvairekajātipratibaddhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetramākīrṇaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi |
S04n411:317: na tatra bodhisattvaḥ syād yo na mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitaḥ syāt;
S04n411:318: sarve te tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāḥ pāramitāsu niveśitāḥ;
S04n411:319: tatraivedaṃ buddhakṣetramantargataṃ kuryāṃ sarve cāmī duḥkhā praśamayeyaṃ |
S04n411:320: bodhisattvabhūto'haṃ bhadanta bhagavan evaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ niṣpādayeyaṃ,
S04n411:325: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya gandhenābhayā ca kṛtsanaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt;
S04n411:326: tasya mūle pañcacāturdvīpikapramāṇaṃ me nānāratnavicitraṃ vajrāsanaṃ syāt,
S04n411:329: paryaṅkamābhujya tenaiva muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yāvat parinirvāṇakālaṃ tatparyaṅkaṃ na bhindyāṃ na muceyaṃ na tasmād bodhivṛkṣamūlāduttiṣṭheyaṃ |
S04n411:330: bodhivṛkṣamūlastha evāhaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo'haṃ nirmitān buddhān bodhisattvāṃśca gaṇanātikrānteṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
S04n411:331: ekaiko buddha ekapūrvabhaktena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet,
S04n411:332: tenaiva pūrvabhaktena gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ avaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ,
S04n411:334: bodhiprāptasya me gaṇanātikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu mama kāyo dṛṣyet,
S04n411:335: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mama kāyo lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtaścakṣurindriyasyābhāsamāgacchet sarve te sattvā niyatā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n411:336: yāvad bodhiparinirvāṇena te sattvā avirahitā bhaveyurbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ |
S04n411:337: na tatrendriyavikalā bhaveyurye ca tatra bodhisattvā māṃ draṣṭuṃ iccheyuste yena yenaiva gaccheyuḥ parivarteyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyuḥ tiṣṭheyuḥ,
S04n411:338: sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samanantarotpāditena buddhanamaskāracittena māṃ bodhivṛkṣaniṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04n411:339: dṛṣṭvā ca yasya dharmasaṃśayaḥ syāt so'sya sahadarśanena vigacchettīrṇavacikitsāḥ syādanupadiṣṭasya dharmapadasyārthamājāneyuḥ |
S04n411:340: apramāṇaṃ me āyurbhavet na śakyate kenacid gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena,
S04n411:342: yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe'haṃ tatra buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe tatra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastrāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:343: yāvan mama parinirvāṇānna cātra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo'pi dīrghakeśaḥ syāt śuklaprāvaraṇo vā,
S04n411:346: tvamapi paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī atīvaśobhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:348: yatastvaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāmarthāyaivaṃrūpāṃ pravarāṃ praśastāṃ matiṃ kṛtavān pravaro buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
S04n411:350: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīranāgate'dhvani atikrāntayordvayornadīvālikāsamayorasaṃkhyeyayoḥ praviṣṭe ca tṛtīye'saṃkhyeye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuddhavirajaḥsannicayo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04n411:354: samantadarśī nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
S04n411:355: evaṃrūpā ca te bodhisattvaparṣadbhaviṣyati sarve caite praṇidhānāstvayi saṃpatsyante yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
S04n411:358: ye ca te mañjuśrīssattvā nāmaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaviṣyati,
S04n411:360: mañjuśrīrāha - “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśāparipūrirbhavediti yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā caiva māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti |
S04n411:365: tebhyaśca māndāravebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaratu yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ pāramitāśabdaḥ balavaiśāradyaśabdaśca niścaratu |
S04n411:366: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeya tadā caivaṃrūpaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhavet“ |
S04n411:367: yadā ca mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā tatkṣaṇādevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhakṣetrāḥ prakaṃpitā,
S04n411:369: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā abhavanyathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:370: ye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti te tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti,
S04n411:371: “ko'tra hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ nimittānāṃ prādurbhāvāya?
S04n411:372: “ te ca buddhā bhagavanto mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n411:377: puṣpāḥ pravṛṣṭā bheṣyase buddha loka“ || iti ||
S04n411:378: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ rājaputramānaṅgaṇaṃ nāmāmantrayati |
S04n411:385: tena tvaṃ kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma bodhisattvo bhavasva |
S04n411:386: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsānāgate'dhvanyatikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikānāmasaṃkhyeye'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsaṃkhyeye purimāyāṃ diśi daśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāllokadhātūnatikramya tatrānimiṣā nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04n411:388: samantabhadro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno bhaviṣyasi yāvad buddho bhagavān |
S04n411:389: evaṃrūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetramanekaguṇavyūhitaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ“ |
S04n411:390: samanantaravyākṛtaśca kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n411:392: sa āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandeyaṃ tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāllokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:393: ye ca tatra lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannā bhaveyuḥ nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā devā vā manuṣyā vā te sarve taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ,
S04n411:394: teṣāṃ kāyavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittavyādhiḥ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca tāvacciraṃ praśāntaṃ bhavedyāvadahaṃ śīrṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ“ |
S04n411:395: atha khalu kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandate |
S04n411:396: atha tavadeva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā babhūvuḥ,
S04n411:397: sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kāyavyādhiścittavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca praśāntaṃ pratiprasrabdhaṃ |
S04n411:403: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ rājaputramabhayaṃ nāmāmantrayate sma |
S04n411:405: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yatra na narakā bhaveyurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ,
S04n411:406: yatra nīlavaiḍūryamayī bhūmirvistareṇa yathā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhā tathā vaktavyāḥ |
S04n411:407: abhayaśca rājaputro ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrataḥ padmaṃ sthāpayitvāha |
S04n411:408: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadahaṃ bhagavato'nubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
S04n411:409: yenāhaṃ bhagavato'grato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsaṃkhyai rathacakrapramāṇamātraiḥ padmaiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣet vayaṃ ca paśyema“ |
S04n411:410: sahodīrate vākye buddhānubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabdhavān,
S04n411:411: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamai rathacakrapramāṇāmātraiḥ padmaiḥ padmavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ,
S04n411:413: bhagavān āha - “atīva kulaputra śobhanaṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:417: sa āha - “yadi mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvāśāparipūrirbhaveta tadete padmā gagane tiṣṭhantu tathaiva gagane sthitā varṣantu“ |
S04n411:419: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra gaganamudro nāma bhavasva |
S04n411:420: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ gaganamudro'nāgate'dhvani atikrānte ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasraṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikrāmayitvā tatra padmā nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04n411:422: padmottaraśca nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān aprameyena śuddhena bodhisattvasaṅghena,
S04n411:425: gaganamudro bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā nipapāta |
S04n411:431: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ rājaputramambaraṃ nāmāntrayati sma |
S04n411:433: yāvad yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:434: “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad daśadiśī gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganeṣu saptaratnamayāḥ chatrāḥ prādurbhavantu hemajālapraticchannāḥ saptaratnamayābhirghaṇṭābhiralaṅkṛtāḥ |
S04n411:435: tatra chatraghaṇṭājālairevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaret yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ pāramitāśabdo balaśabdo'bhijñāśabdo vaiśāradyaśabdaḥ,
S04n411:436: sarve ca te sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te śrutvā sarve'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ |
S04n411:437: ye cātra sattvāḥ pūrvamutpāditabodhicittāste'vaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
S04n411:438: samanantaravyāhṛte'smiṃ vyāhāre atha daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganatalāt peyālaṃ evaṃrūpāḥ śabdā niścaranti |
S04n411:440: punarevaṃ āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ bhagavataḥ purato jñānavairocanaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheya,
S04n411:442: pratilabdhe ca samādhau māṃ bhagavāṃ vyākuryāt“ |
S04n411:446: tena tvaṃ puṇyābhisyandena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā bahavaścaikapramāṇāḥ,
S04n411:449: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ vegavairocanātikrānte'nāgate'dhvanyekanadīgaṅgāvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo'tikramitvā ādityasomā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04n411:450: dharmavaśavartīśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvad buddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:451: sa ca vegavairocano bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandati ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ |
S04n411:457: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ saptamaṃ rājaputramaṅgajamāmantrayāṃ āsa |
S04n411:458: peyālaṃ, “na cāsmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre tatrāhaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbuddheyaṃ |
S04n411:459: yatra ca na narakā na tiryagyoniḥ na yamalokaḥ prajñāyate,
S04n411:460: na mātṛgrāmo na ca sattvānāṃ garbhavāsaḥ,
S04n411:461: na sumeruḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na pāṃśuśailaparvatā notsadaśarkarakaṭhallakaṇṭakagahanā na kāṣṭhavṛkṣā na mahāsamudrā,
S04n411:462: na ca tatrādityacandrā na tārakarūpā na rātridivasā na tamaskandhā,
S04n411:463: na ca tatra sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇakaṃ na kāyakhedadurgandhaṃ,
S04n411:464: na ca sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet na cittaklamatā;
S04n411:466: sarvā ca tatra bhūmiraśmagarbhamayī bhavet anekaratnaśatasahasrālaṅkṛtā bhavet,
S04n411:467: māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca tad buddhakṣetraṃ nānāratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtaṃ bhavet;
S04n411:469: nānāratnaduṣyā nānāratnavastrā nānāratnamālā nānāratnābharaṇālaṅkārālaṅkṛtā nānāmālyebhyo nānāvādyairnānāratnabhājanairnānāpuṣpaiśca te ratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtā bhaveyuḥ;
S04n411:473: samāpannāśca tatra bodhisattvā darśanavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:474: yena samādhinā pratilabdhena daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyuḥ;
S04n411:476: yena daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ |
S04n411:477: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ sarve jātismarā bhaveyuste ca buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān anusmareyuḥ |
S04n411:478: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarve evaṃrūpaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:479: yat samantāddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyeyuḥ |
S04n411:480: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarva evaṃrūpeṇa paracittajñānakauśalyena samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:481: yadekakṣaṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāṃ vijāneyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāṃ te sattvāstāṃ samādhiṃ praṇāmeyū;
S04n411:482: rātryāḥ pratyuṣakālasamaye caturdiśaṃ sugandhāḥ prītikarāśca mṛdusukhasaṃsparśā vāyavo vāyeyuḥ,
S04n411:484: te ca bodhisattvāstābhyaḥ samādhibhyo vyutthihitvā tebhyaḥ puṣpakeśarebhya uttiṣṭheyuḥ;
S04n411:485: tathārūpaṃ ca ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratilabheran yad ekacittakṣaṇene buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānyekaikāṃ diśaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
S04n411:486: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavato vanditvā paryupāsitvā tadā nivarteyuḥ,
S04n411:488: dharmasukhamanasikāreṇa tathāgataṃ prekṣeyuryena yena ca niṣīdeyuḥ parivarteyurvā sarvadiśāsu ca māmeva paśyeyuḥ |
S04n411:489: yathārūpaṃ ca tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimatidharmeṣu saṃśayotpadyeta tatsarvaṃ mama darśanavyavalokanamātreṇa vigaccheyuḥ |
S04n411:490: yathārūpaṃ ca dharmadeśanān te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathārūpaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ mama vyavalokanamātreṇājāneyuḥ |
S04n411:493: sarve ca tatra bodhisattvā avaivartikā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:494: na tatrākuśalasya nāma bhavenna ca tatra buddhakṣetre śikṣāgrahaṇasya nāma bhavet,
S04n411:499: sarve ca tatra sattvā muṇḍā navakāṣāyacīvaraprāvṛtāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ;
S04n411:503: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhiduḥkhaṃ prajñāyeta |
S04n411:504: yeṣāṃ sattvānāmāyuḥparikṣayo bhavet te sarve paryaṅkena parinirvāyeyuḥ,
S04n411:506: caturdiśaśca vāyava āgaccheyuḥ ye tāni bodhisattvaśarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu kṣipeyuḥ |
S04n411:507: evaṃrūpāśca mahāmaṇiratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ tadyathā rājñaścakravartinaḥ prabhāsvaraṃ maṇiratnaṃ;
S04n411:508: ye ca tatra sattvāstāṃ maṇiratnaprabhāṃ paśyeyuḥ taṃ vā maṇiratnaṃ paśyeyuḥ spārśeyurvā te sarve narakatiryagyamalokaduḥkhāni yāvadbodhinirvāṇena mā pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ |
S04n411:509: te ca tataścyavitvā tatropapadyeyuḥ yatra tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
S04n411:510: tatropapannāśca te sattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuste ca bodhicittamutpādayeyuḥ,
S04n411:512: na kaścitsattvo mama buddhakṣetre'samāhitaḥ kālaṃ kuryāt,
S04n411:513: na duḥkhavedanāyā na parasparavyāvadhacittāviprayogamaraṇāya tataśca mārākṣaṇeṣupapadyeyuḥ,
S04n411:514: yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ buddhadarśanenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:515: sarve ca tatra sattvā apagatakhiladveṣamrakṣerṣyāmātsaryā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:518: snigdhacittā mṛducittā avairacittā akilviṣacittāḥ śāntacittāḥ samāhitacittāśca bhaveyuḥ tatra ye sattvā upapadyeyuḥ |
S04n411:521: daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ lokadhātubhirdṛśyeta gandhena ca sphuret |
S04n411:523: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre duḥkhaśabdaḥ śrūyeta |
S04n411:524: tāvaccāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaścaivaṃrūpābhirbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhasaṃpadābhiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
S04n411:526: tataḥ paścād ahaṃ tatra buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ |
S04n411:528: sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ca daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lakṣanālaṅkṛto me kāyaḥ saṃdṛśyediti |
S04n411:529: ye ca tatra sattvā māṃ paśyeyuḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamayet,
S04n411:532: yathāvidhāśca samādhidhāraṇīrākāṅkṣeta tathārūpā māṃ dṛṣṭvā pratilabheyuḥ |
S04n411:533: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ śītanarake pratyājātā bhaveyusteṣāṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhāvedanā prādurbhavet,
S04n411:534: tathārūpāṃ ca sukhāṃ vedanāṃ pratilabheran yathāpi nāma dvitīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoste ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā parameṇa kāyacaitasikena sukhena samarpitā bhaveyuste ca sarve'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeyuste ca tataścyavitvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
S04n411:536: ye ca sattvāḥ pretabhavaneṣūpapannāḥ mama paśyeyuḥ,
S04n411:539: evaṃ devāḥ dviguṇā ca me prabhāsayeyaṃ |
S04n411:542: bodhiprāptasya ca me daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto mama varṇaṃ bhāṣeranyeṣāṃ anuśrāvayeyaṃ;
S04n411:543: ye ca tatra sattvā mama varṇaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te tatra mama buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayeyuḥ,
S04n411:544: te kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ sthāpayitvānantaryakārakāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakāṃ āryāpavādakāṃ |
S04n411:545: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ mama ca buddhakṣetra upapattiṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
S04n411:546: teṣāmahaṃ maraṇakālasamayeṣvanekagaṇaparivṛto vitimirasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ tathārūpeṇa subhāṣitena tān sattvān saṃtoṣayeyaṃ,
S04n411:550: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ |
S04n411:551: ye ca punaranyatra buddhakṣetreṣu saptadhanavirahitāḥ sattvā anarthikāḥ tribhiryānairanarthikā devamānuṣikābhiḥ saṃpattibhiranarthikāḥ kuśalaparyeṣṭyā tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ adharmarāgaraktā viṣamalobhābhibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāsteṣāṃ prabhāsamādhinā maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ tiṣṭheyaṃ,
S04n411:555: te sattvā mamāntike paramaprītiprasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ bodhau ca cittānyutpādyeyuḥ,
S04n411:559: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ“ |
S04n411:562: sa prāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣatu |
S04n411:563: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ te sarve bodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ |
S04n411:564: ahaṃ caitarhi praṇītadyutiṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
S04n411:566: utpāditaśca kulaputra praṇītadyutiḥ samādhiḥ svayamevādrākṣīt tadbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu uragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣitaṃ,
S04n411:567: daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ prāñjalibhūtā adrākṣuḥ,
S04n411:570: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā bodhau samādāpitāstena tvaṃ kulaputra siṃhagandho bhavasva |
S04n411:571: atikrānte siṃhagandha ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsaṃkhyeye'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye uparimāya diśāyeto buddhakṣetrāddvicatvāriṃśatgaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu
S04n411:572: buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya tatra nīlagandhaprabhāsavirajo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04n411:574: prabhāsavirajaḥsamucchrayagandheśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:575: atha khalu kulaputra siṃhagandho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditavān |
S04n411:581: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo'ṣṭamaṃ rājaputramamighaṃ nāmāmantrayāṃ āsa |
S04n411:582: peyālaṃ, “tāvadahaṃ bhagavan kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhisattvabhūto bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ daśasahasrān kliṣṭān buddhakṣetrānevaṃrūpāṃ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
S04n411:586: tathārūpāmahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā nānye bodhisattvāścaranti |
S04n411:587: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannimāni saptavarṣāṇi buddhaguṇabodhisattvaguṇapariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇapariśuddhaṃ rahogata ekākī saṃcintayamāno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04n411:588: darśanavyūhasamādhipūrvaṃgamena ekadaśabodhisattvasamādhisahasrāṇi yāni mayātrotpāditāni pratilabdhāni bhāvitāni,
S04n411:589: eṣā mama bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūtasya bodhisattvacārikā;
S04n411:590: ye'pi te daśasu dikṣvanantāparyantāsvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04n411:591: ye trādhvasamatikrāntā dhvajāgrākeyūrā buddhakṣetrāstāṃ paripūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ āvarteyaṃ |
S04n411:592: tena ca samādhināhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan paramāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavato bodhisattvaśrāvakagaṇaparivṛtān paśyeyaṃ |
S04n411:594: ekaikena cāhaṃ kāyenānuttarairvicitrai ratnaiḥ puṣpairanuttarairvicitrairgandhairmālyaiśca curṇavilepanairvādyaiḥ sarvābhiścānuttarābhirvyūhābhirekaikaṃ pūjayeyaṃ |
S04n411:596: yadā cāhaṃ sarvakāyavibhāvanena samādhinaikakṣaṇenaikaikasya buddhasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhagocarān ājāneyaṃ |
S04n411:598: animiṣasamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekarajāgracittapramāṇena sarvabuddhakṣetrān pūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ |
S04n411:599: araṇāsamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekacittakṣaṇena sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānatītānāgatapratyutpannān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyeyaṃ |
S04n411:600: śūraṅgamasamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavannarakeśvavataritvā nairayikamātmabhāvamabhinirmiṇitvā nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:603: tataścyavitvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāvyatāyāmupapadyeyuḥ yatra buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04n411:617: yathārūpeṇa ca sattvāḥ karmapratyayena sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhāṃ vā pratisaṃvedayanti,
S04n411:624: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā daśasu sarvabuddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantatiṃ tathā pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā pūrvakarmakleśāṃ na kuryuḥ,
S04n411:628: evaṃ mayā svabuddhakṣetrasya svaparṣāyā ca yathā siṃhagandhena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:629: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā daśasu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni praśāmyantu,
S04n411:634: yena te sattvāḥ tān buddhān pūjayeyuḥ,
S04n411:636: ahaṃ ca bhagavan darśanavyūhasamādhānabalena svayaṃ paśyeyaṃ,
S04n411:637: sahodīritayāṃ vācāsminnevameva svayaṃ paśyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ“ iti |
S04n411:639: yastvaṃ kulaputra samantake ca svake ca buddhakṣetre daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇi pariśuddhāni sthāpayiṣyasi |
S04n411:642: tena tvaṃ kulaputra samantabhadro nāma bhavasva |
S04n411:643: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ samantabhadrānāgate'dhvani atikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye parivartāvaśiṣṭe dvitīya uttarāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramitvā tatra jñānatāpasuviśuddhaguṇā nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati;
S04n411:645: jñānavajravijṛmbhiteśvaraketurnāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:646: atha khalu kulaputra samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādayoḥ śirasā nipapāta |
S04n411:651: tvaṃ jñāna ulkadhara bheṣyasi buddha loke“ ||
S04n411:652: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputra samayena daśakuśīdaprāṇasahasrāṇi ekakaṇṭhena vācaṃ babhāṣire |
S04n411:653: “bhaviṣyāma vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan te pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S04n411:654: yāṃ suviśuddhāśayāḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carāmāṇaḥ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayati |
S04n411:655: evaṃ ca vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayitvā tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyema“ |
S04n411:656: evaṃ kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena daśaprāṇisahasrā vyākṛtāḥ |
S04n411:657: “yadā samantabhadro'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate tadā yūyaṃ teṣu sāmantakeṣu lokadhātuṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyadhve |
S04n411:658: sahasraikanāmakāstathāgatā bhaviṣyathaḥ yaduta sahasraṃ jvālakuṇḍeśvaraghoṣā nāma bhaviṣyatha tathāgatāḥ,
S04n411:663: pañcaśatā ekaṃ nāmadheyāḥ yaduta sūryaghoṣanāmā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n411:771: aparaṃ sahasraṃ visṛṣṭadharmarājāno nāgendravimuktibuddhalokasāgaralocanaśailanāmā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ |
S04n411:774: te'pi daśaprāṇasahasrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā nipetuḥ |
S04n411:780: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo navamaṃ rājaputramāmantrayate sma amighaṃ nāma |
S04n411:781: peyālaṃ, sa prāha - “tathārūpamahaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāstiṣṭhanto yāpayantaḥ buddhā bhagavanto bodhicārikāṃ carataḥ sākṣibhūtā bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ |
S04n411:782: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan tvatpurato bodhāya cittamutpādayāmi,
S04n411:784: atrāntareṇa me bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya na vipratisāracittamutpadyeta,
S04n411:789: mā styānamiddhasahagatā mauddhatyasahagatā mā kaukṛtyasahagatā na vicikitsāsahagatā na prāṇātipātaṃ nādattādānaṃ nābrahmacaryaṃ na mṛsāvādaṃ na paiśunyaṃ na pāruṣyaṃ nābhidhyā na vyāpādaṃ na mithyādṛṣṭiḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ na mātsaryasahagataṃ na dharme'gauravacittatā na visaṃvādanacittatā |
S04n411:790: yāvadbodhiparyantān mama bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya ime dharmā na saṃvidyeyuḥ |
S04n411:792: yāvadbodhiparyantena nāhaṃ buddhadarśanena virahito bhaveyaṃ na dharmaśravaṇena na saṅghopasthānena |
S04n411:795: traicīvarikaḥ vṛkṣamūlikaḥ naiṣadyikaḥ āraṇyakaḥ piṇḍapātikaḥ alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ dharmadeśakaḥ ādeyavākyaḥ aparimāṇapratibhānasaṃpanno bhaveyaṃ |
S04n411:799: śūnyatāmanaskāreṇa ca mātṛgrāmasya na dantavidarśanaṃ kuryāt,
S04n411:802: yasya cāhaṃ dharmabhāṇakasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ śāstṛsaṃjñān tasyāntike utpādayeyaṃ,
S04n411:803: satkṛtya cāhaṃ taṃ dharmabhāṇakaṃ yathā tathāgataṃ tathā satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ yāvadātmamāṃsairapi dharmabhāṇakamupasthiteyaṃ |
S04n411:804: na cāhaṃ pātramapātraṃ cāvekṣya dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
S04n411:807: svavīryabalapraṇidhānopārjitena cāhaṃ dravyena vyasanagatān sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ |
S04n411:808: na cāhaṃ pravrajitaliṅginaṃ vā gṛhasthaliṅginaṃ vā āpattyānāpattyā vā codayeyaṃ |
S04n411:810: yadi ca me bhadanta bhagavannime praṇidhānā yāvadbodhiparyantamupādāya saṃṛdhyeyuḥ yathā bhagavataḥ purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:811: tadubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ divyāścakraratnāḥ prādurbhavantu sahasrārāḥ sanābhikāḥ sanemikāḥ ādityavarṇaprabhāsvarāḥ“ |
S04n411:812: sahabhāṣitāyāṃ asyāṃ vāci amighena rājaputreṇobhāyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ tathārūpāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhūtāni yathāyācitāḥ |
S04n411:813: punarāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yāvadbodhiparyantena tadime cakrāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gacchantu,
S04n411:814: evaṃrūpeṇoccaśabdena yathā nandopanandā nāgarājā gacchanti tathā sarvāvantaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ svareṇa vijñāpayantu bodhisattvavyākaraṇasmṛtyasaṃpramoṣajñānadarśanaśūnyatābhāvanāpracārabuddhaviṣayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cārayituṃ |
S04n411:815: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrotrendriyeṣvayaṃ dharmaparyāyamābhāsamāgacchatu,
S04n411:816: nipatitamātre ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamatu,
S04n411:819: preṣitau ca kulaputrāmighena rājaputreṇa tau dvau cakraratnau tau caivaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchatastadyathā buddhā bhagavanto buddhajavena gacchanti;
S04n411:820: evameva tau dvau cakraratnau gacchataḥ daśasu diśāsvaprameyeśvasaṃkhyeyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ bodhisattvavyākaraṇasmṛtyasaṃpramoṣajñānāntargatābhāvanāpracārabuddhadharmaparyāyaṃ cārayanti |
S04n411:822: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rāgo yāvan mātsaryacittacaitasikāḥ praśāntāḥ,
S04n411:823: sarve ca buddhajñānaviṣayaṃ manaskāreṇānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditavanto,
S04n411:824: muhūrtamātreṇa ca te cakrāḥ pratinivṛtyāmighasya rājaputrasya purataḥ sthitāḥ |
S04n411:825: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ amighasya rājaputrasya sādhukāramadāt,
S04n411:828: ime ca divyāścakraratnāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣitā,
S04n411:834: akṣobhya āha - “tādṛśamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhamākāṅkṣāmi yathā sarvalokasvarṇabhūrbhavet,
S04n411:835: samāpāṇitalopamā divyamaṇiratnavyavakīrṇā apagataśarkarakaṭhallā apagataśilāstaṃbhapāṣāṇaparvatā mṛdukā kācalindikasukhasaṃsparṣā,
S04n411:838: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre durgandhā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:841: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ bhavet,
S04n411:842: na ca parasparabhayaṃ na ca parasparaviheṭhā na ca sattvānāmakālamaraṇaṃ vipratisāramaraṇaṃ nāsamāhitamaraṇaṃ |
S04n411:845: na pañcakaṣāyeṣu śūnyesu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāt buddhadarśanāvirahitā bhaveyurdharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā |
S04n411:847: sarve ca tatra daśakuśalāṃ karmapathān samādāya varteyuḥ |
S04n411:848: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ śīlpagrahaṇaṃ bhavet,
S04n411:850: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ mārāvatāraṃ mārgena |
S04n411:851: na ca tatra sattvā durvarṇā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:852: na ca tatra sattvā vaimātra bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:855: na ca tatra śrāvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vā śuklamokṣaṇaṃ bhavet,
S04n411:857: sarve ca tatra sattvā dharmakāmā dharmaparyeṣṭiparā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:858: na ca tatra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo'pi viparītadṛṣṭiko bhavet na cānyatīrthiko,
S04n411:859: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet cittaklamatā vā bhavet;
S04n411:860: sarve ca te tatra sattvāḥ pañcābhijñā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:861: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇā vā bhukṣā vā viheṭhayet,
S04n411:862: yādṛśaṃ cāhāramākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśaṃ ratnabhājaneṣu purataḥ prādurbhavet yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ |
S04n411:863: na coccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇamaśru vā kāye svedo vā bhavet,
S04n411:864: na ca tatra śītaṃ noṣṇaṃ bhavet,
S04n411:867: te ca tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gandhakṛtyaṃ kurvīranyadākāṅkṣeyuḥ yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
S04n411:878: tatra ca sattvānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ kūṭāgārā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:879: teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkāḥ stritāḥ tūlikopadhānairmṛdukācalindikasaṃsparśāḥ prādurbhaveyuryatra manuṣyā vihareyuḥ |
S04n411:884: yathārūpā ca tatra sattvā vastrābharaṇaṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ te tān tebhyaḥ kalpavṛkṣebhyo gṛhītvā prāvareyuḥ,
S04n411:888: vāyusamīritaśca tato bodhivṛkṣāddivyātikrāntaḥ snigdho manojñaḥ pāramitā abhijñendriyabalabodhyaṅgaśabdo niścaret,
S04n411:889: ye ca sattvāstaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuste virāgacittāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ |
S04n411:890: sarvaguṇopetaśca tatra buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo bhavet tadyathā tuṣitadevanikāye'psarāḥ |
S04n411:891: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmo durgandho bhavet,
S04n411:893: na ca tatra manuṣyā mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ maithunakāyasaṃsargamāpadyeyuḥ |
S04n411:895: gatvā mātṛgrāmaṃ sarāgena cittena prekṣate muhūrtena puruṣasya rāgaḥ praśāmyeta,
S04n411:900: yā ca tatra strī puruṣaṃ sarāgaṃ nirīkṣeta gurviṇī bhavet,
S04n411:902: ye garbhavāsairdārakadārikā evaṃ kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
S04n411:903: tadyathā devāstrayastriṃśā nandanti pramodanti kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti |
S04n411:904: evaṃrūpaśca tatra buddhakṣetre garbhavāsā dārakadārikāḥ saptarātriṃdivasāni sukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ |
S04n411:905: tāśca striyo garbhiṇyaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
S04n411:907: na ca te sattvā aśucinā garbhamalena kliśyeyuḥ,
S04n411:908: saptame ca divase paramasugandhena parameṇa ca sukhopadhānena samarpitāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ |
S04n411:909: na caiva sā strī duḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaved,
S04n411:910: ubhau ca puṣkariṇīmavataritvā snātvā ca sā strī evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheta,
S04n411:914: yacca pūrvajanmani tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavedyena ca bahukalpakoṭīstrībhāvamanubhavitavyaṃ tena samādhinābhinirvṛtena strībhāvaṃ ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacched,
S04n411:915: yāvat parinirvāṇaṃ na bhūyaḥ strībhāvaṃ pratilabhet |
S04n411:916: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavet yad gaṇanātikrāntān kalpān nityagarbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavitavyaṃ bhavet,
S04n411:917: te bodhiprāptasya me nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ prasādaṃ ca pratilabheyuste tataścyavitvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyurgarbhavāsena ca pratyājāyeyustatra sarveṇa sarvaṃ tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvadbodhiparyantena na bhūyaste sattvā garbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurye sattvā avaruptakuśalamūlāste padmeṣu pratyājāyeyuḥ,
S04n411:919: karmaparikṣayena mama buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo vā garbhavāso vā prajñāyeta ekāntasukhasamarpitāste sattvāstatra buddhakṣetre bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:921: tena ca śabdena tatra manuṣyā ulkāvatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā te sattvāḥ śūnyatāvabhāsāṃ gambhīrān dharmān avabudhyeyuḥ |
S04n411:922: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre kāmopasaṃhitaḥ śabdo bhavet |
S04n411:923: bodhivṛkṣamūlaniṣaṇṇaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpnūyāṃ |
S04n411:924: bodhiprāptasya ca me tatra buddhakṣetre na bhūyaścandrasūryāṇāṃ prabhā prajñāyeta,
S04n411:926: evaṃrūpāṃ cāhaṃ prabhāṃ pramuñceyaṃ yena divyena cakṣuṣāprameyāsaṃkhyeyairanyairbuddhakṣetraistiṣṭhato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ |
S04n411:927: bodhiprāptaścāhamevaṃrūpeṇa svareṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yena svareṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetramāpūrayeyaṃ,
S04n411:928: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ syuḥ te sarve buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste yena yena gaccheyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyurvā parivarteyurvā,
S04n411:929: te satatasamitaṃ māṃ paśyeyuryathārūpeṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃśayā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ mama darśanamātreṇa vyavalokanamātreṇa ca teṣāṃ saṃśayā vigaccheyuḥ |
S04n411:930: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vānuttarayānikā vā mama nāmaṃ vā varṇaṃ va śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04n411:932: te tatra mama dharmaṃ śrutvā ye śrāvakayānikāste'ṣṭavimokṣadhyāyino'rhanto bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:933: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ te pratyekāṃ bodhimabhigaccheyuḥ,
S04n411:934: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā mahāyānikāste mat sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā gambhīrāṃ samādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:936: aprameyaśca me śrāvakasaṅgho bhaved yo na śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra svayaṃ tathāgatena |
S04n411:937: bodhiprāptaścāhaṃ yena yena gaccheyaṃ yatra yatra ca pādatalena pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ tatra tatra sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:938: te ca padmāḥ śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā mama varṇaśabdaṃ ghoṣaṃ niścārayeyuḥ;
S04n411:939: te ca sattvā mama nāma varṇaṃ yaśaśca śrutvā prītiprasādaprāmodyamutpādayeyuḥ,
S04n411:944: apagataśramaṇavākyāpagataśramaṇakauṭilyāpagataśramaṇaśāṭhyā apagataparṣā bhaveddharmagurukā na pariṣkāragurukā na lābhasatkāragurukā,
S04n411:945: anityaduḥkhānātmaśūnyatābhiratā ārabdhavīryā ca sā parṣadbhaveddharmaśravaṇā saṅghaprāgbhārā |
S04n411:946: ye ca tatrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā bhaveyuste'nāgatapraviṣṭāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste jātivyativṛttā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayeyuḥ,
S04n411:947: yāvadbodhiparyantena te dharmā na saṃpramoṣaṃ gaccheyuḥ |
S04n411:952: bhaviṣyasi tvamakṣobhyānāgate'dhvani atikrānte hyekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeya'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi,
S04n411:954: evaṃrūpayā guṇavyūhayā saṃpannā yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:956: evamevākṣobhyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:957: akṣobhya āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvatra lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaparigṛhītā ye ca sattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītāste sarve maitracittā bhavantvavairacittā akaluṣacittāste evaṃrūpaṃ kāyasukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ tadyathāpi nāma daśabhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya padmasamādhiṃ samāpannasya yenāśayaprahāṇaviśuddhirbhavati,
S04n411:958: evaṃrūpeṇa sattvāḥ kāyacaitasikena sukhena samārpitā bhavantu |
S04n411:959: yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeta tadā sarvapṛthivī svarṇāvabhāsā bhavatu“ |
S04n411:960: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā ca tasmin samaye sarvasattvā evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:967: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo daśamaṃ rājaputraṃ himaṇiṃ nāmāmantrayate sma |
S04n411:968: peyālaṃ himaṇī rājaputra evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānamakārṣīt tadyathākṣobhyena kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:969: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavan nevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvasattvā buddhālaṃbanamanaskāraṃ pratilabhantu |
S04n411:971: te ca sarve taṃ gandhaṃ buddhavigraheṣu pariṇāmayantu“ |
S04n411:974: yacca tvayā sarvasattvā uragasāracandanahastā sthāpitā buddhamanaskāraścāśayenotpāditaḥ,
S04n411:976: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ gandhahaste'tikrāntānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ avaśiṣṭe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'kṣobhye tathāgate'rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe parinirvṛte saddharme'ntarhite saptame dviase tvaṃ gandhahaste tatra lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04n411:977: suvarṇapuṣpo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:978: gandhahastirapyāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeyaṃ tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣatu“ |
S04n411:979: yadā khalu kulaputra gandhahastirbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat |
S04n411:985: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa ekādaśamaṃ rājaputraṃ siṃhaṃ nāmāmantrayāmāsa |
S04n411:990: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ ratnaketo'nāgate'dhvani atikrānte gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye tatrābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau parinirvṛte svarṇapuṣpe tathāgate tasya ca saddharme'ntarhite trayāṇāṃ antarakalpānāmatyayena tadbuddhakṣetraṃ jayasomaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati,
S04n411:991: tatra tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase nāgavinarditeśvaraghoṣo nāma bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān |
S04n411:992: evaṃrūpaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhena yathākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya“ |
