S04n411:1233: tatra pīṭhe suvarṇapātraṃ sthāpayitvā saptaratnaparipūrṇasuvarṇamayaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ saptaratnamayā yaṣṭirbuddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṅghe niyojitavān |
S04n411:1234: sa āha -“bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannanāgate'dhvanyatikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye tasmiṃśca bhadrakalpe tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno hīyamāne āyuṣi utpanne kaliyuganimitte tīvrarāgadveṣamohamānerṣyāmātsaryaparyutthitānāṃ sattvānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyakalyāṇamitrasanniśritānāṃ sattvānāmakuśalamūlaparyutthitacittānāṃ kuśalamūlaparihīṇacittānāṃ samyagdṛṣṭivivarjitacittānāṃ mithyājīvākuśalacittānāṃ,
S04n411:1235: parinirvṛte kanakamunau tathāgate saddharme'ntarhite'ndhe loke'nāyake viṃśativarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ“ |
S04n411:1236: tasya kulaputra viśvaguptasya brāhmaṇasya ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “sādhu sādhu brāhmaṇa mahāvidvān jñānasamanvāgataḥ,
S04n411:1237: tvaṃ satpuruṣotpanne kaliyuganimitte yāvadviṃśativarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāmandhe loke'nāyake praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:1238: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa vidvagañjakaruṇāśrayo nāma bhavasva |
S04n411:1239: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ vidvagañjakaruṇāśrayānāgate'dhvanyatikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmavaśiṣṭe dvitīye sahāyāṃ lokadhātau anupraviṣṭe bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:1240: atha khalu kulaputra vidvagañjakaruṇāśrayo bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte'sthāt,
S04n411:1251: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ vimalavaiśāyanaṃ māṇavakaṃ saṃcodayāṃ āsa |
S04n411:1252: atha khalu kulaputra vimalavaiśāyano māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitvāha - “evamevāhamasmin bhadrake kalpe bodhimākāṅkṣāmi,
S04n411:1254: yathā kāśyapasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya daśavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dānadamaparikṣīṇāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ saptadhanavirahitānāṃ akalyāṇamitre śāstṛsaṃjñāpratipannacittā bhavanti,
S04n411:1262: tāvat pañcakaṣāye loke hāyamānā daśavarṣāyuṣkā bhavanti,
S04n411:1263: śastrāntarakalpe pratyupasthite tatkālamahaṃ devebhyo'vatīrya sattvān paritrāyeyaṃ,
S04n411:1271: yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta vyākarotu māṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n411:1272: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ na lapsyāmi,
S04n411:1273: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ prārthayāmi na ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ yena yānena śīghraṃ saṃsārādvimucyāmi“ |
S04n411:1275: yaiḥ kuśīdavastubhiḥ samanvāgatā ekatyā bodhisattvā dīrghasaṃsāralābhino dṛṣṭiprapāte saṃsāracārake duḥkhānyanubhavanti,
S04n411:1286: na ca sarvaparityāgī na sarvatraparityāgī bhavati,
S04n411:1288: na cādhyāśayena buddhakṣetraguṇavyuhān pratigṛhṇāti vaineyamanavekṣya praṇidhānaṃ pratigṛhṇāti |
S04n411:1289: ebhiścaturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kuśīdo bodhisattvaḥ ciraṃ saṃsāracārake duḥkhamanubhavati,
S04n411:1295: sarvaparityāgī sarvatraparityāgī sattvānāṃ duḥkhaparimocanārthaṃ karuṇācittotpādaṃ dadāti,
S04n411:1305: dānātṛptatayā dharmaśravaṇātṛptatayā bhāvanātṛptatayā sattvebhyaḥ saṅgrahavastvatṛptatayā viharatavyaṃ |
S04n411:1319: acintyacakramatulyacakraṃ anabhilāpyacakraṃ nairyāṇikacakraṃ nairvedhikacakraṃ apravṛtticakraṃ pravartayanti |
S04n411:1320: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ vimalavaiśāyanānāgate'dhvanyatikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'cirapraviṣṭe bhadrake kalpe praśānte pañcakaṣāye kāle vardhamāne āyuṣi aśītivarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04n411:1321: maitreyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān“ |
S04n411:1322: atha vimalavaiśāyano brāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvaikānte sthitvā puṣpamālyacurṇairbhagavataḥ pūjodyukto gāthābhirabhiṣṭauti |
S04n411:1325: kaste na nayu muni vṛṣabhā lokapradīpā guṇaśatabharitā kālo'yaṃ me uktaṃ bhavahi buddhajage“ ||
S04n411:1326: sarve samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena purohitena sahasraṃ vedapāṭhakānāṃ bodhau samādāpitāṃ |
S04n411:1327: yathā krakutsandaḥ kanakamuniḥ kāśyapo maitreyo vyākṛta evaṃ siṃhaḥ pradyotaḥ yāvaddvirūnaṃ sahasraṃ vedapāṭhakānāṃ māṇavakānāṃ sarve'smin bhadrake kalpe'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ,
S04n411:1328: sarve ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatenāsminneva bhadrake kalpe'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyavasthāpitāḥ |
S04n411:1367: sa ca kulaputra mahābalavegadhārī māṇavaka āha -
S04n411:1373: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastato'bhiniṣkramya svakāṃ pañcabrāhmaṇadārakānupasthāyakānāmantrayitvovāca - “bho dārakā utpādayatānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ“ |
S04n411:1375: “nāsmākaṃ kiñcid asti yad vayaṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṅghasya niryātayāmaḥ |
S04n411:1377: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo'grapurohitaḥ prathamaḥ karabhujo nāmopasthāyakaḥ tasya saptaratnamayaṃ karṇavibhūṣaṇaṃ datvā,
S04n411:1378: dvitīyaḥ sthālabhujo nāmopasthāyakaḥ tasya dvitīyaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ karṇaveṭhakaṃ datvā,
S04n411:1379: tṛtīyaḥ jalabhujo nāmopasthāyakastasya saptaratnamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ dadāti,
S04n411:1380: ceturthaḥ vegabhujo nāmopasthāyakastasya saptaratnamayaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadāti,
S04n411:1382: “gacchata yūyaṃ māṇavakā imāni vastūni buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṅghasya niryātayitvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha“ |
S04n411:1383: atha te pañcopasthāyakā gatvā bhagavatsakāśaṃ tāni vastuni yathā nikṣiptāni buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṅghasya niryātayitvaivamāhuḥ |
S04n411:1386: peyālaṃ, vyākṛtāḥ kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena karabhujo māṇavako bodhāya bhadrakalpe dṛḍhasvaro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ,
S04n411:1389: tasyānusaṃdheḥ vegabhujaḥ priyaprasanno nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ,
S04n411:1390: tasyānusaṃdheḥ sārabhujo nāma māṇavako haripatracūḍo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ |
S04n411:1391: samanantaravyākṛtāste pañcabhadrakalpikā māṇavakāḥ purohitaḥ punarapi mahābalavegadhāriṇamāha - “mahābalavegadhārī gṛhṇāhi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān,
S04n411:1397: sa ca kulaputra mahābalavegadhārī māṇavako bhagavataḥ purato niṣaṇṇaścāha - “kiyadbahavo bhagavannanāgate'dhvani munibhāskarā asmin bhadrakalpe udayanti?
S04n411:1398: “ ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “tasmin māṇavaka bhadrake kalpe caturuttaraṃ sahasraṃ munibhāskarāṇāṃ udayaḥ |
S04n411:1399: māṇavaka āha - “yāvatteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan bhadrake mahākalpe nirvṛtānāṃ jinasūryāṇāṃ paścimako sārabhujo nāma māṇavako'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate haripatracūḍo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgata,
S04n411:1401: sarveṣāṃ ca bhadrakalpikānāmacirābhisaṃbuddhānāṃ prathamaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dadyāṃ;
S04n411:1404: śīlavirahitān sattvān śīlasaṃpadi samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1405: dṛṣṭivirahitān saṅkaṭaprāptān sattvān samyakdṛṣṭyāṃ samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1409: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmacirāstāṅgate saddharme punarahaṃ saddharmanetrī saddharmaparigrahaṃ saddharmasyotpādaṃ saddharmapradīpaṃ loke jvālayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1410: śastrāntarakalpakālasamaye sattvān prāṇātipātavairamaṇyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ yāvat samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ;
S04n411:1415: durbhikṣāntarakalpakālasamaye'haṃ sattvāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayeyaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1422: sarve sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrakalpe sattvānevaṃrūpairvyasanaiḥ parimocayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1423: yadā caturuttaraṃ sahasraṃ buddhā bhagavanto bhadrake mahākalpe utpannā nirvṛtāśca bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:1424: sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca saddharmanetrī antarhitā bhavet,
S04n411:1426: yāvāṃścaturuttarasahasrāṇāṃ bhadrakalpikānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāyurbhavet tāntakam mama bodhiprāptasya dīrghamāyurbhavet;
S04n411:1427: yāvāṃśca teṣāṃ śrāvakasaṅgho bhavet tāvān mamaikasya śrāvakasaṅghaḥ syāt;
S04n411:1428: yāvataśca te kalpaiścaturuttaraṃ buddhasahasraṃ sattvān viniyet tāvataḥ sattvān ahaṃ vinayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1429: ye ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ skhaleyurdṛṣṭiprapāte vā prapateyurbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśe'gauravacittāḥ praduṣṭacittā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:1431: rāgacittā āryāpavādāḥ ānantaryakārāśca bhaveyurbodhiprāptaścāhaṃ sarvān saṃsārapaṅkāduddhareyaṃ,
S04n411:1433: yāvan mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmakṣayo na bhavet tāvad bhadrakamahākalpe'kṣayo bhaveyaṃ;
S04n411:1435: ye mama dhātavo janmaśarīraḥ te'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāstathāgatavigrahāḥ saṃtiṣṭheran dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtagātrāḥ,
S04n411:1437: te ca tathāgatavigrahā daśasu dikṣvaprameyebhyo'saṃkhyeyebhyaḥ śūnyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo gatvā ekaiko buddhavigraho'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ sattvān samādāpayet niveśayet pratiṣṭhāpayed;
S04n411:1438: yatra buddhakṣetre'ntarakalpe na nāśo bhavet tatra tathāgatavigrahaḥ sattvān paritrāyedyathā pūrvoktaṃ tathā paścāccintāmaṇiḥ prādurbhavet;
S04n411:1439: yeśu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ratnavirahitā bhaveyuḥ teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā ratnavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣānnidhayaśca saṃdarśayeyuḥ;
S04n411:1440: yeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāḥ kuśalakriyāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ vyādhibhīḥ kliṣṭāsteṣu buddhakṣetresu gośīrṣoragasārakālānusārī gandhavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣeyuḥ,
S04n411:1441: sā ca gandhavṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāṃ kleśavyādhīrdṛṣṭivyādhīḥ kāyavyādhīśca praśamayet;
S04n411:1442: tataste sattvāḥ puṇyakriyāvastuṣvabhiyuktā bhaveyuḥ svargaparāyaṇā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:1443: evaṃrūpamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ sattvān paritrāyeyaṃ |
S04n411:1446: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannaivaṃrūpā āśā paripūryetā na ca sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūto bhaveyaṃ,
S04n411:1447: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanatāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04n411:1449: ye'pi te saṃpratipannāṃ bhagavan bahuprāṇakoṭyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ sattvāstān ahaṃ buddhān bhagavato virādhayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1451: mā ca me bhūyo bodhihetoḥ saṃsāre saṃsāramāṇasya buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ kuśalaśabdaḥ kuśalakarmakriyāśabdaḥ śrotrapatheṣu nipatet,
S04n411:1456: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ satpuruṣa sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūtaḥ duḥkhebhyaśca parimocakastena tvaṃ satpuruṣa bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalo nāma bhavasva |
S04n411:1457: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalānāgate'dhvanyekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'tikrānte'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye bhadrake kalpe caturuttarasya buddhasahasrasyācirābhisaṃbuddhānāṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsyasi yāvadyathā svayaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:1458: nirvṛtasya ca haripatracūḍabhadrasya tathāgatasya saddharme'ntarhite'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04n411:1459: rocaśca nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān |
S04n411:1461: yāvacca tasya caturuttarasya buddhasahasrasya bhadrakalpikānāṃ śrāvakasaṅgho bhaviṣyati tāvacca tavaikasya śrāvakasaṅgho bhaviṣyati,
S04n411:1463: parinirvṛtasya ca saddharmāntardhānaṃ bhadrakasya mahākalpasya kalpakṣayo na bhaviṣyati;
S04n411:1465: yāvacchūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gandhavṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāṃ kleśavyādhirdṛṣṭivyādhīḥ kāyavyādhīśca śamayiṣyati,
S04n411:1466: triṣu caiva puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti svargaparāyaṇāṃśca“ |
S04n411:1467: atha khalu kulaputra bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalo bodhisattva āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā me bhagavān satapuṇyalakṣaṇālaṅkṛtena pāṇinā mūrdhānāṃ sparśatu“ |
S04n411:1468: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇālaṅkṛtena pāṇinā bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalasya bodhisattvasya mūrdhānaṃ parimārjayitvā tasthau |
S04n411:1469: atha khalu kulaputra bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalo bodhisattvastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditacitto ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditavaikānte'tikramya sthitaṃ |
S04n411:1475: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaitadabhavat - “mayā bahavaḥ prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāni,
S04n411:1476: yathedaṃ sarvāvantaṃ parṣadaṃ paśyāmi sarvaiścemairmahāsattvairudārodārāṇi praṇidhānāni kṛtāni prasannāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi parigṛhītāni sthāpayitvā vāyuviṣṇunānyairbodhisattvaiḥ kaliyugaṃ parivarjitaṃ |
S04n411:1477: mayāpi kaliyugakāle vartamāne sattvā dharmarasena tarpayitavyā,
S04n411:1479: tathārūpeṇa ca mayā praṇidhānena siṃhanādo naditavyaḥ |
S04n411:1481: sarvāvatī ceyaṃ parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣāsuraśca loko'yaṃ māṃ prāñjalībhūto namasyeta pūjāṃ ca kuryād |
S04n411:1482: ayaṃ ca me buddho bhagavān sādhukāramanuprayacchet vyākuryāt,
S04n411:1483: tathā ye ca daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti te'pi buddhā bhagavanto mama siṃhanādaṃ nadataḥ sādhukāraṃ pradadyuḥ,
S04n411:1485: dūtāṃśca preṣayeyuryat sarvāvatīyaṃ parṣat śṛṇuyāt tāṃśca dūtān paśyet |
S04n411:1486: ye'pi ca tasyāṃ paścātkāle mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatā bodhisattvāste'pyevaṃrūpaṃ kliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ mahākaliyugakāle bodhiṃ praṇidhānena pratigṛhṇīyurdharmadurbhikṣakāntāre kleśaughairuhyamānān sattvān paritrāyeyuḥ,
S04n411:1489: yāvat parinirvṛtasyāpi me'cintyāḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātikrānte daśasu dikṣvatulyebhyo'parimāṇebhyaśca buddhakṣetrebhyo'parimāṇā buddhā bhagavanto mama parinirvṛtasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeran,
S04n411:1492: te ca bodhisattvā mama karuṇāparibhāvitādhiṣṭānaṃ praṇidhānaṃ śrutvā paramāścaryaprāptā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:1494: tataśca te evaṃrūpaṃ eva praṇidhānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuryathāhametarhi pratigṛhṇāmi,
S04n411:1499: evaṃrūpaṃ kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo agrapurohito mahākaruṇāparibhāvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ sarjayitvā,
S04n411:1500: ekāṃśaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmati sma |
S04n411:1501: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahudevakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi gaganatale divyāni tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vādyanti puṣpavṛṣṭiśca pravarṣitā,
S04n411:1506: kleśavyākule loke praśamayiṣyasi duḥkhaskandhaṃ sattvānāṃ jñānatoyena praśamayiṣyasi“ |
S04n411:1507: sarvāvatī sā parṣatprāñjalībhūtā abhimukhā ekakaṇṭhena vadati |
S04n411:1509: pravarapaṇḍitāsmākaṃ hitakara kuruṣva dṛḍhapraṇidhānaṃ pravarabuddhimayaṃ śṛṇomaḥ“ |
S04n411:1510: purohitaścopasaṃkrāmati yadā ca nikṣiptaṃ purohitena bhagavataḥ sakāśe jānumaṇḍalaṃ,
S04n411:1511: tāvaccāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvāvatīdaṃ saṃtaraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ kaṃpati prakaṃpati calati pracalati kṣubhyati prakṣubhyati vedhati pravedhati,
S04n411:1513: ye ca mṛgapakṣiṇaste sarve manojñaṃ snigdhaṃ ca śabdamudīrayanti,
S04n411:1515: ye kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīṃ niśritya bhūtāḥ prativasanti ye bodhau samādāpitā ye na ca samādāpitāḥ,
S04n411:1517: sarve hitacittāḥ kalyāṇacittā avairacittā akaluṣacittā maitricittā āścaryacittā babhūvuḥ |
S04n411:1518: ye sattvāḥ svargacarāste khe sthā evaṃ paramaprītimanasaḥ,
S04n411:1519: puṣpairmālyairgandhairvādyai ratnacchatrairdhvajaiḥ patākābhirvastraduṣyaiḥ snigdhamanojñaṃ śabdaṃ brāhmaṇasya praṇidhānaṃ śravaṇāyodyuktāḥ pūjākarmaṇe |
S04n411:1520: caivaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantā devā jambūdvīpaṃ avatīrya gaganatale sthitvā divyairgandhairyāvadduṣyairbrāhmaṇasya praṇidhānaṃ śravaṇārthamudyuktāḥ pūjākarmaṇe |
S04n411:1562: yadā kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo'grapurohito ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamābhirgāthābhiḥ stutvā tasthau,
S04n411:1563: tāvadeva sā sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣā sādhukāramadāt ||
S04n411:1564: purohita āha - “mayā bhadanta bhagavan bahuprāṇakoṭyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāstaiśca svakasvakodārodārāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi parigṛhītāni pariśuddhāśayāvaruptakuśalamūlāḥ suvinītāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ |
S04n411:1565: ime ca jyotipālapūrvaṃgamānāṃ caturuttarasahasraṃ vedapāṭhakāṇaṃ ye tathāgatena bhadrakalpikā vyākṛtāḥ,
S04n411:1567: tadapi taistīvrakleśāvaraṇakaliyugakaṣāyāḥ parivarjitāstairutsṛṣṭā ānantaryakārakāḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā mithyādṛṣṭaya āryasaptadhanavirahitā amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakārakā apuṇyakarāḥ paralokabhayādarśino viparītatattvabodhino'nāthakāstriṣu sucariteṣu,
S04n411:1568: tathā devamānuṣikābhiḥ śrīsaṃpattibhirudyuktāḥ triṣu duścariteṣu saṃpratipannāḥ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu virahitāḥ sarvakalyāṇamitrai riñcitāḥ sarvapaṇḍitaiḥ prakṣiptā bhavacārake'nuśrotamuhyantaḥ kṣāranadyāṃ sīdantaḥ saṃsārapaṅkairmohāndhakārāvirahitā nirmuktāḥ sarvakuśalakriyāyāṃ sarve śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūjjhitāḥ sakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatāḥ kumārgavihanyanto mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāstasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre daśavarṣāyuṣkā bhadrakalpe manuṣyā bhaviṣyanti,
S04n411:1570: tatkālaṃ bhavāvartake saṃsāracakre'trāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā duḥkhabhājanabhūtāḥ sattvāstāṃ parivarjayitvā svakasvakā buddhakṣetrāḥ pradhānapradhānāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04n411:1571: suvinītāśca pariśuddhāśayāḥ avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ ārabdhavīryā bahubuddhakṛtādhikārā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ |
S04n411:1575: yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāśca parigṛhītāstatraiva ca mayā vyākṛtāḥ“ |
S04n411:1576: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha - “mamāpi bhadanta bhagavan hṛdayaṃ kaṃpati tadyathāpi kiṃśukapatraṃ paramadīnamānaso'haṃ sarvaśarīraṃ ca me āyāsitaṃ,
S04n411:1577: yadi me bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ karuṇāspadabhūtā bodhisattvaistatkālamutsṛṣṭā mahākaliyugāndhakāraprakṣiptāḥ sarvaparivarjitāḥ |
S04n411:1578: ahamapi bhadanta bhagavannanāgate'dhvani atikrānte ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye tasmiṃśca bhadrake mahākalpe daśavarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇāstāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre na parikhidyeyaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇa,
S04n411:1581: śrutaṃ ca mayā bhagavataḥ sakāśād “vastunimittaṃ parityāgeyaṃ dānapāramitā“ |
S04n411:1582: tathārūpamahaṃ dānapāramitāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā janmāntareṣvaprameyāḥ sattvā yācanakā āgamiṣyanti teṣāṃ tathārūpāṃ parityāgaṃ parityajeyaṃ,
S04n411:1583: tadyathānnapānakhādyabhojyapeyalehyavastraśayyāsanāśrayapratiśrayamālyagandhavilepanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyadānaṃ chatradhvajapatākādhanadhānyahastyaśvarathasuvarṇarūpyahiraṇyamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā-pravāḍarajatajātarūpadakṣiṇāvartasarvāmahamevaṃ parityāgaṃ paramaprāsādakāruṇyamānasaḥ sattvānāṃ datvāphalābhikāṅkṣī sattvaparipācanārthaṃ vaineyasattvānugrahārthaṃ tyāgasaṃbhāraṃ parityajeyaṃ |
S04n411:1584: ye ca punaḥ sattvā atityāgayācanakā āgatvā yācayeran tadyathā dāsadāsīgrāmanagararājyabhāryāputraduhitṛhastaparityāgapādaparityāgakarṇanāsānayanajihvā-
S04n411:1586: evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ paramaprasannaḥ kāruṇyamānasaḥ aphalābhikāṅkṣī sattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadyāṃ vaineyānukaṃpārthaṃ |
S04n411:1588: yanna kadācit pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvena evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ syurna ca punaḥ paścāt kaścid bodhisattvaḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ parityājet |
S04n411:1589: yadahaṃ teṣu janmāntareṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ careyaṃ |
S04n411:1590: yadahaṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatānāṃ paścimakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ parityāganetrīguṇān sthāpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1592: tathāhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇo vividhaśīlavratanirantaraduṣkaracārikāṃ careyaṃ,
S04n411:1597: “yā vivekatā sarvasaṃskṛtā bhāvanā udyujyanā sarvāsaṃskṛtaśāntamanuttaracaryayā avivartanā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā“ |
S04n411:1598: “yā sarvasaṃskāreṣu viparyāsaprahāṇāya śūnyatā samudācāraḥ iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā“ |
S04n411:1602: na kaścid bodhisattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇaḥ syāṃ,
S04n411:1603: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścid bodhisattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
S04n411:1608: śīlāniśrayatā kṣāntyāmanyanatā vīrye'nāyūhanatā dhyāneṣvapratiṣṭhitatā prajñāyāmadvayatāṃ careyaṃ |
S04n411:1609: aphalākāṅkṣī āryasaptadhanavirahitānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvaśūnyabuddhakṣetrojjhitānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakānāmāryāparvādakānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭikānāmakuśalamūlasamavadhānasaṅkaṭaprāptānāṃ kumārge vihanyamānānāṃ sattvānāmarthāyāhaṃ pāramitāstīvrabalavegotsāhena careyaṃ |
S04n411:1610: ekaikasya sattvasyārthe cāhaṃ kuśalamūlabījasaṃtatyāḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ daśamahākalpān avīcinarake duḥkhāṃ vedanāmutsaheyaṃ,
S04n411:1611: evaṃ tiryakpreteṣu yakṣadaridreṣu manuṣyadaridreṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāmutsaheyaṃ |
S04n411:1612: yathā caikasattvasya santatyāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ tathā sarvasattvānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ riktamuṣṭisadṛśasantānāṃ vaineyāṃ pratigṛhṇīyaṃ |
S04n411:1615: tāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsitvā ekaikasya ca buddhasyāhaṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ vividhāṃ pūjāṃ kuryāṃ,
S04n411:1616: ekaikasya ca buddhasya sakāśādbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān guṇān adhigaccheyaṃ,
S04n411:1618: evaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāmevaṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ yathābhiprāyāṃśca sattvān tathāhaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1619: asati buddhotpāde loka ṛṣivratenāhaṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu niyojayeyaṃ samādhāvabhijñāsu ca niyojayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1621: nārāyaṇabhaktāṃścandrasūryabhaktāṃ yāvadbrahmabhaktān brahmarūpeṇāhaṃ sattvān kuśaladharmeṣu niyojayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1625: vyasanagatāṃśca sattvāṃ svakena kāyena jīvitena ca paritrāyeyaṃ |
S04n411:1626: tāvacciramahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan dagdhasantānānāṃ kuśalamūlaparihīnānāmarthāyātibalavegena cārikāṃ caraṃ,
S04n411:1627: tāvacciraṃ cāhaṃ saṃsāre sattvahetorvividhacaṇḍaghoradāruṇāṃ duḥkhāṃ praticcheyaṃ:
S04n411:1628: yāvadatikrāntānekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ nirgatānām avaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvāikāsame'saṃkhyeye'nupraviṣṭe bhadrake mahākalpe yadā jyotipālo māṇavako'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyati krakutsando nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu lokadhātuṣu pravartitadhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ |
S04n411:1629: ye mayā dagdhasantānā akuśalamūlasamādhānāḥ saptadhanavirahitāḥ sarvaiḥ śūnyairbuddhakṣetrairujjhitā ānantaryakārakāḥ saddharmapratikṣepakā āryāpavādakā yāvatkumārge vihanyantaḥ mayā saṅkaṭaprāptāḥ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n411:1630: mayā te sattvāḥ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ niveśitāḥ syurmayā ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatkuśalamūlabījamanuttare nirvāṇe prakṣiptaṃ syāt,
S04n411:1632: prajñāpuṇyasaṃbhāre ca niyojitāḥ syustiṣṭhanto yāpayantasteṣu ca buddhakṣetresu buddheṣu bhagavatasūpanītāḥ syuryadānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇapratilabdhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:1633: samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhāśca syurbhūmyavakrāntāśca syurmayā ca te sattvā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā praṇidhānaṃ samādāpitāḥ śikṣāpitāśca syuryathārūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ pratigṛhṇeyuste ca tān ahaṃ tasmin samaye'nupraviṣṭe bhadrakalpe krakutsande jinasūrya udgate daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ tiṣṭhato yāpayataḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ;
S04n411:1640: ye ca tasmin samaye dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dṛṣṭimārgasaṃpratipannā ānantaryakārakāḥ kumārgavihanyamānāsteṣāṃ mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1642: astāṃgate jinasūrye tadāhamanābhogena buddhakāryaṃ kuryāṃ yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvānniyojayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1643: tasmiṃśca kāle'tikrānte devalokaṃ gatvā devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1647: pañcakaṣāyāndhakāraprakṣiptāḥ sattvāḥ tīvrarāgāstīvradveṣāstīvramohāstivramānāstīvrapāperṣyāmatsariṇo'dharmarāgaraktā adharmabhogaparyeṣṭino mithyādṛṣṭayo viparītadarśanā āryasaptadhanavirahitā amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakarā apuṇyakarā aparalokabhayadarśino'nabhiyuktāstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu anarthikāstribhiryānairanabhiyuktāstriṣu sucariteṣu abhiyuktāstriṣu duścariteṣu anabhiyuktā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu abhiyuktā daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu caturviparyāsopahatāścaturvipattisaṃsthānāścaturmāravaśagatāścaturbhiroghairuhyamānāḥ pañcanīvaraṇavaśagatāḥ sattvā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n411:1648: ṣaḍindriyamadamattā aṣṭamithyātvapratipannāḥ kāmasaṅkaṭaprāptā anuśayasamutthāpakā anarthikā devamanuṣyaśrīsaṃpattibhirviparītadṛṣṭikāḥ kumārge vihanyamānā ānantaryakārakāḥ saddharmapratikṣepakā āryāpavādakāḥ sarvakuśalamūlaparihīṇā dhvāṅkṣāmukharā akṛtajñā muṣṭasmṛtayaḥ kuśalajugupsakā duḥprajñā alpaśrutā duḥśīlāḥ kuhakā matsariṇaḥ parasparābhāṣakā anyonyāgauravāḥ kuśīdā vikalendriyā durbalāścīvaravirahitā akalyāṇamitrasaṃgṛhītā garbhāśayasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā vividharogapahatāḥ kliṣṭā durvarṇā avahoṭimakā ahrīkā anapatrāpyāḥ parasparabhītā ekapūrvabhaktena bahukāyavācā manasā duścaritaṃ samācaranti te praśaṃsitaśāśvatadṛṣṭikāḥ sattvā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n411:1649: pañcaskandhābhiniviṣṭacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāgṛddhacittā duṣṭacittā vyāpannacittā vairacittā vihiṃsācittāḥ kaluṣacittā rukṣacittāḥ kṣubhitacittā adāntacittā ahitacittā uddhatacittā adharmābhiniviṣṭacittā anavasthitacittāḥ parasparasārambhacittāḥ parasparavadhakacittā dharmavivarjitacittā avipakvacittā dharmeṣu sārambhacittā akuśala utpāditacittāḥ śāntanirvāṇāparyeṣṭicittā adakṣiṇiyacittāḥ sarvasaṃyojanabandhanasamudānanacittā vyādhijarāmaraṇāsaṃpratyayacittāḥ sarvasaṃyojanādhiṣṭhitacittāḥ sarvanīvaraṇaparigrahacittā dharmadhvajaprapātanacittā dṛṣṭidhvajocchrayaṇacittāḥ parasparāvarṇacittā anyonyabhakṣaṇacittāḥ parasparapīḍanaiśvaryacitta dveṣasamudgrahaṇacittā anyonyāghātacittāḥ kāmebhyo'tṛptacittāḥ sarvaparigrahamātsaryacittā akṛtajñacittāḥ paradārākramaṇacittā vyāpādavihiṃsanacittā apraṇidhānacittāḥ sattvāstatkāle bhaviṣyanti |
S04n411:1651: narakaśabdastiryagyoniśabdo yamalokaśabdo vyādhiśabdo jarāśabdo maraṇaśabdo vadhakaśabdo'kṣaṇaśabdo nityāriśabdo haḍinigaḍabandhanacārakaśabdo daṇḍapīḍanāśabdo'varṇakrośanaparibhāṣaṇāśabdaḥ saṃdhicchedanaśabdo gaṇacchedanaśabdaścauryaśabdaḥ paracakraśabdo durbhikṣaśabdaḥ kāmamithyācāraśabdo mṛṣāvādaśabda utpātaśabdaḥ paiśunyaśabdaḥ paruṣaśabdaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaśabda īrṣyāmātsaryaśabda āgrahaparigrahaśabdo'haṅkāramamakāraśabdaḥ priyāpriyaśabda iṣṭāniṣṭaśabdaḥ priyaviprayogaśabdaḥ krayavikrayaśabdo'nyonyadāsaviheṭhanāśabdo garbhavāsaśabdo durgandhaśabdaḥ śītaśabda uṣṇaśabdo jighatsāpipāsāśabdaḥ śrāntaklāntavedanāśabdaḥ kṛṣikarmāntaśabdo vividhakarmaśilpaparikhinnaśabdo vividharogopahataśabdaḥ,
S04n411:1653: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇakuśalamūlaiḥ parihīṇakalyāṇamitrairduṣṭacittaiḥ sattvaistasmin kāle sahālokadhāturākīrṇā bhaviṣyati |
S04n411:1654: ujjhitāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sarvajñaiḥ śūnyairbuddhakṣetrairyathānnapānadamasaṃyamakuśalakarmakriyākuśalasamavadhānā āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāstamastamaḥparāyaṇāḥ pragāḍhakarmapratyayena te sattvāstasmin samaye bhadrakalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkeṣu pratyājāyiṣyanti |
S04n411:1655: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmapratyayena sahabuddhakṣetraṃ hīnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04n411:1662: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śaṣpauṣadhitṛṇavṛkṣā patrapuṣpaphalā dhānyarasāḥ sattvānāmannapānabhogaparibhogaviṣamāḥ kaluṣaparuṣarukṣaviṣasaṃsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n411:1663: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣā duṣṭāścaṇḍā raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakā anyonyāgauravā bhītena cittenāghātacittā vadhakacittā bhaviṣyanti,
S04n411:1664: māṃsabhojanarudhirāhārā mṛgacarmaprāvaraṇāḥ praharaṇādhiṣṭhānāḥ prāṇivadhodyuktā rūpakulavaṃśaiśvaryaśāstralipyaśvārohaṇadhanurgrahāyudhaparivārā mātsaryadarpitā bhaviṣyanti;
S04n411:1666: tatkālamahaṃ tuṣitabhavanādavatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravartikulavaṃśe īśvare rājakule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineyasattvakuśalamūlaparipācanārthaṃ garbhavāsamupagṛhṇīyāṃ;
S04n411:1667: sarvāvantaṃ tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ,
S04n411:1668: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyanto'haṃ heṣṭhaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ |
S04n411:1669: ye ca tasmin samaye sattvā sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātā narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā devamanuṣye vā te sarve tamavabhāsaṃ paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ;
S04n411:1670: teṣāṃ saṃsāre vimṛśatāṃ duḥkhodvignānāṃ nirvāṇābhilāṣamantaśaḥ kleśaśamacittānyutpādayeyuḥ |
S04n411:1672: yadāhaṃ sarvadharmanayavipaścitaṃ sarvasamādhinirdeśamekadharmamukhamaparāntakalpanirdeśena samāhitacitto daśamāsāṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyaṃ;
S04n411:1673: yāvāṃścāhaṃ prāpte buddhatve sattvāṃ parikhinnāṃ saṃsāre parimocayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1674: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ |
S04n411:1675: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1676: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1677: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1679: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ;
S04n411:1680: tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1683: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantena;
S04n411:1684: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1687: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā śakrā vā candrā vā sūryā vā lokapālā vā mahānāgarājā vāsurendrā vā aupapādukā vā maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ |
S04n411:1689: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ prasādaṃ pratilaṃbhayet |
S04n411:1690: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
S04n411:1691: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04n411:1692: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
S04n411:1693: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ |
S04n411:1694: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
S04n411:1695: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ |
S04n411:1696: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni ca dadarśa śikṣāpanayogyaṃ stryagāre pañca kāmaguṇaratikrīḍārdharātrāvudvignaniṣkramaṇālaṅkāravibhūṣaṇacchoraṇaṃ lohitavastrābhīkṣṇaṃ kāṣāyavastraparyeṣaṇabodhivṛkṣopasaṃkramaṇaṃ,
S04n411:1698: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ sattvānāṃ sarvapuṇyasamuccayena samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ |
S04n411:1699: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04n411:1700: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ |
S04n411:1701: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;
S04n411:1708: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
S04n411:1710: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
S04n411:1716: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
S04n411:1719: yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
S04n411:1720: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
S04n411:1722: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
S04n411:1725: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
S04n411:1727: ye manuṣyarājā vā bhaṭṭā vā naigamajānapadā gṛhasthapravrajitā gṛhāgārasaṃpannāste'pi mama duṣkaracaryāmupasaṃkrāmeyuryāvacchrāvakayānikā yathā pūrvoktaṃ |
S04n411:1729: sa tasya paścimako mātṛgrāmapratilābho bhaved iti,
S04n411:1731: ye mṛgapakṣiṇo duṣkaraṃ caramāṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyussa teṣāṃ paścimakastiryagyonipratilābho bhaved iti;
S04n411:1732: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ |
S04n411:1734: evaṃ pretā vaktavyāstāvacciraṃ cāhamevaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ ekaparyaṅkena yāvad bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryāyāṃ sākṣibhūtā bhaveyuḥ āścaryaprāptāśca,
S04n411:1736: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ syāt;
S04n411:1737: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ śaktāṃścarantu yathāhaṃ careyaṃ |
S04n411:1738: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1743: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1749: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1750: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ |
S04n411:1752: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet |
S04n411:1754: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
S04n411:1756: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
S04n411:1760: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
S04n411:1761: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1762: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1765: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
S04n411:1767: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ buddhavigrahānnirmiṇuyāṃ dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtānaśītibhiranuvyañjanaistāṃścāhaṃ buddhavigrahān śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1770: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
S04n411:1771: ye'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ saṃsārāṭavīsaṃprasthitāḥ kumārgavihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ,
S04n411:1772: tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrādeko buddhavigraha ekadivase sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet |
S04n411:1773: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1774: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1775: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
S04n411:1777: yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1779: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
S04n411:1780: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ |
S04n411:1781: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ |
S04n411:1782: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
S04n411:1783: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S04n411:1784: piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
S04n411:1785: teṣām sattvānāmarthe'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:1786: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1791: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04n411:1792: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ |
S04n411:1793: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04n411:1799: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04n411:1800: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04n411:1803: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04n411:1883: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi caturaśītisamādhimukhasahasrāṇi pañcasaptatidhāraṇīmukhasahasrāṇi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ekapadavyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1921: apramāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmekapadavyāhāreṇāhaṃ mahatā kuśalaviśodhanasaṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1925: ye'pi te bhadanta bhagavan sattvā bhaveyuranyeṣu lokadhātuṣvānantaryakārakā yāvanmūlāpattisāparādhikā dagdhasantānāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā anuttaramahāyānikā vā praṇidhānavaśena mama buddhakṣetre pratyājāyeyuḥ |
S04n411:1926: akuśalamūlasamavadhānā rukṣāḥ pāpecchāḥ krūrakhaṭuṅkasantānā viparītabuddhaya āgṛhītasantānāḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ caturaśītiścittarutasahasrāṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04n411:1927: yāvat kuśīdacittānāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1928: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vistareṇa ṣaṭpāramitādharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1929: dānapāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1930: ye ca punastatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:1940: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvapañcadoṣā bhaveyustāṃ pañcadoṣavairamaṇyopāsakasaṃvare vyavasthāpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1941: ye sattvā anabhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tāṃścāhaṃ rātriṃdivasamaṣṭāṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1944: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭukāmāstānapyahaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacaryavāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1945: evaṃrūpānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvad āgṛhītasantānānāṃ sattvānāmarthe cāhaṃ bahuvividhanānārthapadavyañjanaprātihāryairdharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:1947: kuśale kṣeme śive śānte'bhayapure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ |
S04n411:1948: evamahaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1949: ye ca vādārthino bhaveyusteṣāṃ ahaṃ dharmavādaśāstraṃ prakāśayeyaṃ;
S04n411:1950: ye ca nābhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vaiyāvṛtyakarmāṇi nirdiśeyam,
S04n411:1960: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,
S04n411:1962: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śāsane'ntaśa ekaśikṣāpadamapi gṛhṇīyuryathoktaṃ samādāya varteyuryāvaccatuṣpadagāthāṃ paryavāpnuyurvācayeyuḥ,
S04n411:1964: ye'pi śṛṇuyuścittaṃ vā prasādayeyurdharmabhāṇakasya vā pūjāṃ kuryurantaśa ekapuṣpeṇāpi ekavandanenāpi,
S04n411:1966: yāvat saddharme'ntarhite saddharmolkāyāṃ nirvāpitāyāṃ dharmadhvaje patite te ca mama janmaśarīramavatareyuryāvat kāñcanacakre tiṣṭheyuryasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre ratnadurbhikṣaṃ bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatirnāma maṇivaiḍuryamayaṃ agninirbhāsaṃ tiṣṭhet |
S04n411:1967: tacca tato'bhyudgamyorddhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavane sthitvā vividhāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣet,

S04n411:1984: tadyathā māndāravamahāmāndāravapāriyātrā yāvadevānantaprabhāstasmācca puṣpavarṣādvividhā manojñāḥ śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdo yāvatpūrvoktaṃ |

S04n411:2004: apare buddhā bhagavanto mama śarīravivartanebhiḥ pūrvayogaiḥ sattvānāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā vistareṇa bhāṣayeyuḥ,
S04n411:2006: parinirvṛtasya śarīrebhirevaṃ ciramevaṃrūpaṇāṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya evaṃrūpāṇi vividhāni prātihāryāṇi vividhā ca nānāprakārā vikurvaṇākṛtāstasya śarīravikurvaṇābhirvayaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃcoditāḥ,
S04n411:2007: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vayaṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānān prathamacittotpādādidaṃ pāramitāsu codyogaḥ kṛtaḥ,

S04n411:2010: sa evamāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā cāhamanāgate'dhvani bhadarake kalpe tīvrakleṣe raṇakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāṇe'ndhaloke'nāyake'pariṇāyake dṛṣṭivyasanāndhakāraprakṣipte loke ānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvat pūrvoktaṃ;
S04n411:2011: yadi cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalamevaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ yathā ca me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:2015: na ca punarahaṃ anena kuśalamulena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayāmi,
S04n411:2024: śīlaṃ svargopapattaye śrutaṃ mahāprajñatāyai bhāvanā visaṃyogāya“ |
S04n411:2027: yacca mayā bhadanta bhagavan dānamayaṃ vā śīlamayaṃ vā śrutamayaṃ vā bhāvanāmayaṃ vā puṇyamārjitaṃ syāt |
S04n411:2028: yadi naivaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pariṇāmayāmi;
S04n411:2029: ye sattvāḥ pracaṇḍamaṇḍaghore'vīcau narake duḥkhānyanubhavanti te cānena kuśalamūlena tato vyuttiṣṭhantu,
S04n411:2033: yacca teṣāṃ sattvānāmaparikṣīṇakarmaphalaṃ syāttadahametarhi kālaṃ kṛtvāvicau mahānarake upapadyeyaṃ;
S04n411:2035: ekaikaśca me kāyaḥ sumeruparvatarājapramāṇo mahān saṃbhavet;
S04n411:2036: ekaikaśca me kāya evaṃrūpāḥ suduḥkhā vedanā jānīyādyathaitarhi eṣa ekaḥ śarīraḥ suduḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ saṃjānāti;
S04n411:2037: ekaikaśca me ātmabhāvo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ tīvrāṃ caṇḍāṃ kharāṃ nairayikāṃ kāraṇāṃ anubhaveyurye caitarhi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvadavīciparāyaṇāni karmāṇi samudānītāni syuryacca yāvadbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu mahākalpeṣvatikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvānantaryakarmāṇi kṣipeyuḥ samutthāpayeyurvā,
S04n411:2040: sarve ca te sattvā buddhā bhagavanta ārāgayeyuḥ,

S04n411:2046: evaṃ santāpane mahāraurave saṅghāte kālasūtre saṃjīvane,
S04n411:2051: yadā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvairevaṃrūpaṃ karmākṣiptaṃ syāt,
S04n411:2052: ye ca manuṣyāndhabadhirā ajihvākā ahastakā apādakāḥ smṛtipramuṣṭacittairutpādyitavyaṃ aśucibhakṣayitavyaṃ,
S04n411:2055: yāvacciraṃ saṃsāre dhātvāyatanaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyustāvacciramahaṃ evaṃrūpāṃ vividhe narakatiryakpreteṣu yakṣāsurarākṣaseṣu yāvan manuṣyaduḥkhopapattibhirevaṃ duḥkhamanubhaveyaṃ,

S04n411:2066: sthāpayitvā tathāgataṃ te sarve'śrūṇi pravartayamānāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāhuḥ |
S04n411:2070: tadādhyāśayena sarvasattvā mahākaruṇayā saṃcchāditāya bhūyasānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ pratigṛhītā;
S04n411:2071: etena praṇidhānena jñāyate yathā tvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūtastrāṇaṃsvayaṃ ca rājā amṛtaśuddhaḥ prarudamāno brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāha |

S04n411:2177: yadā ca kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati |
S04n411:2178: atha tāvadeva mahāpṛthivicālaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ samantācca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pṛthivī calati pracalati saṃpracalati kṣubhati prakṣubhati saṃprakṣubhati vedhati pravedhati saṃpravedhati raṇati praraṇati saṃpraraṇati |
S04n411:2180: vividhā ca puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitāstadyathā māndāravamahāmāndāravaṃ yāvadanantaprabhā evaṃrūpā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitavatī |
S04n411:2181: yaddaśasu diśāsu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu apariśuddheṣu vā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |

S04n411:2185: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pūrvasyāṃ diśi ito buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya ratnavicayā nāma lokadhātustatra ratnavicaye buddhakṣetre ratnacandro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati yāpayati aprameyebhyo'saṃkhyeyebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ puraskṛtaḥ parivṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma yaduta buddhakṣetre mahāyānakathā |

S04n411:2189: ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “asti kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamān buddhakṣetrānatikramya tatra santīraṇo nāma lokadhātuḥ |

S04n411:2191: ekaścātra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenaivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mahākaruṇāparibhāvitā vāgbhāṣitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇanirdeśaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathārūpā praṇidhānā udbhāṣitā yadbahubhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhirbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,

S04n411:2194: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣat sadevagandharvamāṇuṣāsuraśca lokastaṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamapahāya tasya mahākāruṇikasya paścimakasya pūjāyodyuktāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena ca vanditvā prāñjalībhūtāḥ sthitāstasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate |
S04n411:2195: sa ca mahāsattvastasya bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇo vyākaraṇaṃ śṛṇvānaḥ |
S04n411:2196: yadā ca sa mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ purato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptavāṃstadā sa bhagavāṃstathārūpaṃ smitaṃ prādurakārṣidyathā daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaścalitāḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ cābhipravarṣitaṃ |
S04n411:2197: sarvatra ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prabodhanārthaṃ mahākaruṇābodhisattvapraṇidhānacaryānidarśanārthaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamebhyo digbhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ sannipatanārthaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ samādhānamukhanirdeśacaryāvaiśāradyadharmaparyāyāṃ bhāṣaṇārthaṃ tena tathāgatena evaṃrūpāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśitāni“ |

S04n411:2332: tadyathāpi nāma brāhmaṇa saṃpannaṃ puṣpakṣetraṃ nānāvarṇaṃ nānāgandhaṃ nānāsparśaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānādaṇḍaṃ nānāmūlaṃ nānābhaiṣajyopakaraṇasthānaṃ |
S04n411:2333: kecidatra puṣpā yojanaśataṃ pramāṇena varṇena gandhena tapanti virocanti,
S04n411:2336: kecidatra puṣpā yāvat sarvacāturdvīpikāṃ lokadhātuṃ varṇena gandhena tapanti virocanti |
S04n411:2337: ye ca tatra sattvāścakṣurhīnāste puṣpagandhaṃ ghrātvā cakṣuṃsi pratilabhante,
S04n411:2340: ye ca tatra sattvāścaturuttararogaśatopadrutāste taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā sarvarogebhyaḥ parimucyeyuḥ |
S04n411:2341: ye ca tatra sattvā mattonmattaparamattāḥ suptacittā vikṣiptacittāḥ smṛtipraṇaṣṭāsteṣāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhamāghrātvā sarve smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ |
S04n411:2342: evaṃ ca tatra madhye puṣpakṣetre puṇḍarīkamutpannaṃ,
S04n411:2343: dṛḍhasāraṃ vajramayaṃ vaidūryadaṇḍaṃ śatakomalaṃ kanakapatramaśmagarbhakiṃśukaṃ lohitamuktikeśaraṃ,
S04n411:2345: tacca puṇḍarīkaṃ daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāllokadhātuṃ varṇena gandhena sphuritvā virocate |
S04n411:2346: ye ca brāhmaṇa teṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā dhātuviruddhāḥ kāyā vyādhyupahatā aṅgavihīnā vā mattapramattonmattāḥ suptasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā vikṣiptacittāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya puṇḍarīkasyāvabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ ghrātvā sarvavyādhayaḥ praśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ smṛtiṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ |
S04n411:2347: ye ca tatra buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā mṛtā acirakālagatā avikṣiptaśarīrāsteṣāṃ kuṇapebhyaḥ tasya puṇḍarīkasya raśmayo nipatitvā gandhena vā spṛṣṭvā punaste kuṇapā jīvitendriyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04n411:2348: punaścottiṣṭheyurmitrasālohitāṃśca dṛṣṭvā te sarve udyānaṃ praviśya pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samaṅgībhūtā vihareyusye ca punastataścyaveyusteṣu dve brahmavihāra upapadyeyuḥ,
S04n411:2352: yathā sūryodgamanakāle pratyupasthite te puṣpā visaritā prasphulitā bhavanti tapanti virocanti kecidyojanaśatamuccatvena kecid yāvad yojanasahasramuccatvena,
S04n411:2354: evameva satpuruṣāḥ tathāgato buddhasūryo loka udapādi |
S04n411:2355: yathā te puṣpāḥ sūryoditasya asya raśmibhirvikasitā bhāsanti tapanti virocanti,
S04n411:2357: evamevāhaṃ satpuruṣa loka utpannaḥ sattvāṃ kāruṇyaraśmibhiḥ chādayitvā vikasitvā bhūyaḥ sattvāṃstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niyojayāmi,
S04n411:2358: tvayāpyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveṣitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā mama ca sakāśamupanītāstaiśca sattvairmama sakāśe svakasvakāni praṇidhānāni kṛtāni buddhakṣetrāṇi ca parigṛhītāni,
S04n411:2361: yaiḥ satpuruṣairmama sakāśāt pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrāḥ parigṛhītāstaiḥ śuddhāśayāḥ suvineyā avaruptakuśalamūlā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ parigṛhītā,
S04n411:2365: na ca te bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ karuṇārthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣante |
S04n411:2370: yeṣāmevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavarjitā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatairmātṛgrāmairvivarjite narakatiryagyoniyamalokavivarjite buddhakṣetre'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyurmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparivarjitāṃ śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04n411:2372: bahūni kalpāni śūddhāśayānāṃ suvinītānāṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānagatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ |
S04n411:2375: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārayitvā pañcabhiraṅgulībhirnānāvarṇā anekavarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇā raśmayaḥ prāmuñcan,
S04n411:2376: te gatvā raśmayo'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā purimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrān avabhāsayitvā,
S04n411:2378: tatrāṅguṣṭhāyāṃ lokadhātau daśavarṣāyuṣkā manuṣyā durvarṇā drohoḍimakā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā aṅguṣṭhamātramuccatvena |
S04n411:2380: sa ca kaliyugapramāṇānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ hastapramāṇena hastamekaṃ tathāgata ūrdhvatvena hastaśca;
S04n411:2382: sa ca tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ tribhiryānairdharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n411:2383: atha khalu kulaputra tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃśca manuṣyāṃstaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sarvāvatī ca sā parṣādrākṣīt |
S04n411:2384: ratnagarbhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha āha - “anena jyotīrasena tathāgatenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairatikrāntaiḥ prathamacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasyāgrato,
S04n411:2386: yathābhiprāyāṃ sattvaistasya tathāgatasya purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:2387: kecidbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītāḥ pariśuddhāḥ kecidapariśuddhāḥ pañcakaṣāyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ |
S04n411:2388: tatra ca tena mahāsattvenāhaṃ samādāpito niveśitaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksabodhau |
S04n411:2389: tatra ca mayā ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasya purato'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:2390: sa ca me tathāgataḥ sādhukāramadāsīt vyākṛtaścāhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n411:2391: yo'sāvasmākaṃ bodhāya samādāyakaḥ kalyāṇamitro'tīva satpuruṣastīvrapañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne kāle pratikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
S04n411:2392: ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasantānāḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntārasaṅkaṭaprāptā vaineyasattva praṇidhānaḥ parigṛhītastasya satpuruṣasya daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo'nyonyalokadhātubhyastiṣṭhanto yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāraṃ pradattavantaḥ preṣitavanto,
S04n411:2394: sa ca mahākaruṇāvairocanasaumyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitro hitakara etarhyacirābhisaṃbuddho'ṅguṣṭhavatyāṃ lokadhātau aṅguṣṭhapramāṇānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye,
S04n411:2395: teṣāṃ evāṅguṣṭhapramāṇānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ hastapramāṇena hastapramāṇakaḥ sa tathāgato daśavarṣāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitavān;
S04n411:2396: tasyāpi bodhiprāptasya daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo lokadhātubhyastiṣṭhadbhiryāpayadbhistaistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdūtāḥ preṣitāḥ pūjanārthāya,
S04n411:2397: ye tena prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
S04n411:2398: ye tena prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ pūrvakṛtajñatāmanusmaraṇamāṇaistasya tathāgatasya puṣpāḥ preṣitāḥ |
S04n411:2399: paśya brāhmaṇa yathā te buddhā bhagavataḥ sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu dīrgheṇāyuṣā pariśuddhāśayānāṃ sukhavihāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti;
S04n411:2400: sa ca jyotīrasastathāgata evaṃ pratikruṣṭe pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre buddhatvaṃ prāptavān,
S04n411:2401: ānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatānāṃ sattvānāmevālpakenāyuṣā bahvatirekaṃ buddhakāryaṃ karoti,
S04n411:2403: evameva tvayā satpuruṣa sarvāmimāṃ bodhisattvaparṣāmabhibhūya viśiṣṭataraṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04n411:2404: pratikruṣṭe buddhakṣetre pañcakaṣāye vartamāne ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ parigṛhītāḥ |
S04n411:2405: ye ca te mahāsattvā yaiḥ pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrāḥ parigṛhītā narakatiryagyoniparivarjitāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparivarjitāḥ śuddhāśayāḥ suvinītā avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītā ime sattvāḥ puṣpopamā ucyante,
S04n411:2406: na te mahāsattvāḥ puṇḍarīkopamā ye suvinītānāmavaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ madhye buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyanti |
S04n411:2416: tadyathāpi nāma brāhmaṇa imān mahābodhisattvaparṣāṃ sthāpayitvā vāyuviṣṇunā yenāpariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ kleśākulāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītā ekatyo bhadrakalpikāḥ kulaputrāḥ |
S04n411:2426: tadyathāpi tvaṃ brāhmaṇaitarhi aprameyānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ madhye kuśalavyākaraṇakṣetraṃ tathāgatasyāgrataḥ karuṇāpuṇḍarīkamutpannaṃ praṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa |
S04n411:2427: yadā tvayā ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstīvraṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ |
S04n411:2428: mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa tvaṃ satpuruṣa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sādhukāro datto,
S04n411:2432: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahākāruṇikānāgate'dhvanyatikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāṃ parīttāvaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame'saṃkhyeye,
S04n411:2433: tasmineva sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrake kalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ,
S04n411:2434: jarāmaraṇādyadhike buddhakṣetre'ndhaloke'nāyake'kuśalamūlasamavadhānagate kumārge vihanyamānānāṃ mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptānāṃ sattvānāmānantaryakārakānāmāryāpavādakānāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakānāṃ mūlāpattisamāpannānāṃ yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ,
S04n411:2435: ākīrṇe loke tathāgato bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān;
S04n411:2436: vivartitagaticakraḥ pravartitadharmacakraḥ vivartitavaśavartimārakleśamāraśca anantāparyantāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇi śabdenāpūrayitvā,
S04n411:2440: yathā tasmin samaye'yaṃ rājāmṛtaśuddho'mitāyurnāmāprameyaiḥ kalpaiḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
S04n411:2441: evameva tvaṃ mahākāruṇika tatra sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrake mahākalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyāṃ prajāyāṃ pañcacatvāriṃśatibhirvarṣairevaṃrūpaṃ sakalaṃ mahābuddhakāryaṃ kariṣyasi,
S04n411:2443: parinirvṛtasya ca te satpuruṣānuttaraparinirvāṇenādhikaṃ varṣasahasraṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyate |
S04n411:2444: saddharme cāntarhite tava satpuruṣa te'pi dhātavaḥ janmaśarīre evaṃrūpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04n411:2449: sa evamāha - “teṣu teṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu tava satpuruṣa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasyāhaṃ nityopasthāyaka upakaraṇamaitryānukūlaḥ sahāyako bhūtvā tvāmupasthiheyaṃ;
S04n411:2452: tvaṃ ca māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
S04n411:2454: sāpyāha - “teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasyāhaṃ janetrī mātā bhaveyaṃ |
S04n411:2455: bodhiprāptaśca tvaṃ mahākāruṇika māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
S04n411:2457: sāpyāha - “teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasyāhaṃ kṣīradhātrī mātā bhaveyaṃ |
S04n411:2463: bodhiprāptasya ca te vayaṃ śrāvakayugaprajñāvanto ṛddhimantaśca bhavemaḥ“ |
S04n411:2465: sa evamāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇika teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasya putro bhaveyaṃ“ |
S04n411:2467: sāpyāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇika tāsu tāsu jātiṣu bhāryā bhaveyaṃ |
S04n411:2468: bodhiprāptaśca tvaṃ satpuruṣa māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
S04n411:2470: so'pyāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇikā teṣu teṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu satpuruṣa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasyāhamupakaraṇamaitryānukulaḥ sahāyo dāsatvenopasthiheyaṃ,
S04n411:2472: bodhiprāptasya ca te satpuruṣa dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartane'dhyayeyaṃ,
S04n411:2473: ahaṃ ca te dharmadeśanāṃ prathamāṃ saphalāṃ kuryāṃ,
S04n411:2477: peyālaṃ, gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāśca tatra devanāgāsurā mahākāruṇikasyānupravṛtticaryāya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavanto vaineyamupanyastā |
S04n411:2479: sa āha - “ahaṃ te bho mahābrāhmaṇa bahūpakaraṇasahāyako bhaviṣyāmi |
S04n411:2481: nityaṃ ca tvatsakāśamupasaṃkrameyaṃ vastuyācanārthaṃ śayyāsanavāhanahastyaśvarathagrāmanigamanagarakulaputraduhitṛmāṃsarudhiracarmāsthihastapādajihvākarṇanāsanayanaśīrṣāṇi ca yāceyaṃ |
S04n411:2484: evaṃrūpo'haṃ mahābrāhmaṇa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasya tava ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sahāyako bhaveyaṃ;
S04n411:2485: yāvattvaṃ bodhiṃ prāpnuyā ahaṃ ca te śrāvakasthānamāsādayeyaṃ,
S04n411:2487: tvaṃ ca māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
S04n411:2488: śrutvā ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko brāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvā,
S04n411:2489: taṃ saṃjñāvikaraṇabhīṣmājīvikaṃ śabdāpayitvāha - “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa yastvaṃ mama sahāyako bhaviṣyasi anuttaracaryāya,
S04n411:2493: bhūyaśca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purata āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavaṃsteṣu teṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇasya ye mama purato yācanakāḥ sthitvānnaṃ yācanti mṛduvacanena vā puruṣavacanena vā ullaṅghanavacanena vā spaṣṭavacanena vā yāceyuḥ;
S04n411:2494: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasyāntike ekacittakṣaṇamapi roṣaṃ utpādayeyaṃ |
S04n411:2495: aprasādaṃ votpādayeyaṃ dānasya vā phalavipākaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇo dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
S04n411:2496: visaṃvāditā me bhaveyuḥ ye'prameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04n411:2498: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasya prasannacitto dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
S04n411:2501: antaśo vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ |
S04n411:2502: yadīdaṃ pratigrāhakasya vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvantarāyaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04n411:2505: yāvad ye mama yācanakāḥ śīrṣaṃ yāceyuḥ,
S04n411:2506: mṛduvacanena vā paruṣavacanena vā ullaṅghyavacanena vā spaṣṭavacanena vā śīrṣaṃ yācayeran;
S04n411:2507: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasyāntike ekacittakṣaṇamapi roṣamutpādayeyaṃ,
S04n411:2512: yathā dānamevaṃ śīlaṃ yāvatprajñā parityāgo vācyaḥ“ |
S04n411:2513: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sādhukāramadāsīt |
S04n411:2515: mahākaruṇāpratiṣṭhitena manasā tvayā satpuruṣemaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ“ |
S04n411:2516: sā ca kulaputra sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣāsuraśca lokaḥ prāñjalībhūtaḥ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ prādāsīt |
S04n411:2518: mahākaruṇāpratiṣṭhitena manasā tvayā satpuruṣa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam |
S04n411:2520: sa ca kulaputra yathā saṃjñāvikārabhīṣmājīviko bodhisattvo dānapratigrāhikayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān,
S04n411:2522: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastānyevaṃrūpāṇi praṇidhānāni caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ sakāśācchrutvā saṃjñāvikārabhīṣmeṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:2523: atha mahākāruṇikaḥ paramaprītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjalībhūtaḥ sthitvā sarvāvatīṃ parṣāṃ vyavalokya paramaprītamanā āha |
S04n411:2525: bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ dharmadurbhikṣakṣīṇakāle mahākleśaraṇe kaliyuge pañcakaṣāye vartamāne loke'nāyake sārthavāho'vabhāsakaraḥ pradīpakaraḥ atrāṇānāmandhānāṃ mārganidarśakaḥ |
S04n411:2526: yatra hi nāmāhaṃ prathamacittotpādenaivamevaṃrūpāmanuttarāyāṃ bodhicaryāyāṃ sahāyakāḥ pratilabdhā ye mama janmāntareṣu śīrṣapratigrāhakā bhaviṣyanti nayanakarṇanāsājihvāhastapādacarmāsthirudhiraṃ yāvadannasya pratigrāhakā bhaviṣyanti“ |
S04n411:2527: punarapi kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇa āha - “ye ca mama bhadanta bhagavan teṣu teṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu janmāntareṣu yācanakā upasaṃkrāmeyuryadi vānnaṃ yadi vā pānaṃ yāvacchiraḥ pratigṛhṇīyurantaśo vālāgrakoṭīpramānamātramapi mama hastadānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuryāvadbodhiparyantena |
S04n411:2528: sacedahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya na tāṃ sattvāṃ saṃsārāt parimocayeyaṃ,
S04n411:2529: na ca punarvyākuryāṃ chrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā,
S04n411:2530: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ ya etarhi daśasu dikṣu,
S04n411:2533: punarapi kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sādhukāraṃ prādāsīt |
S04n411:2536: yathā meruśikhariṃdhareṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādena lokeśvarajyotiṣastathāgatasya purataḥ evaṃrūpayā bodhisattvacaryayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃrūpā bodhisattvacārikā cīrṇā yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ |
S04n411:2537: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā mahākalpā atikrāntā yathā tena satpuruṣeṇa purimāyāṃ diśīto koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetre jvālapratisaṃkhyāyāṃ lokadhātau varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho,
S04n411:2538: jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvaro nāma babhūva tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān,
S04n411:2540: tasya khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya varṣasahasraṃ saddharmanetrī asthāsīt;
S04n411:2542: ye khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmanetryavasthitāyāṃ saddharmapratirūpakā vā bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī vā duḥśīlapāpadharmā viṣamasamudācārāḥ staupikavastugrāhakālajjikā vā dharmapūjācchedālajjasaṃsṛṣṭā vā caturdiśasaṅghasya vā saṃmukhībhūtasaṅghasya vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā chinnaṃ paudgalikaparigrahe yāvadātmanā paribhuktaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ vā dattaṃ;
S04n411:2543: tena khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvareṇa tathāgatena sarve'nupūrveṇa vyākṛtastribhiryānaiḥ |
S04n411:2544: ye kecin mahākāruṇika tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane raktakāṣāyaprāvṛtāḥ sarve te avaivartikā vyākṛtāstribhiryānaiḥ;
S04n411:2545: ye'pi kecin mūlāpattisamāpannā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā pūrvameva te tena tathāgatena śāstṛsaṃjñākuśalamūlavipākena tribhiryānairavaivartikā vyākṛtāḥ“ |
S04n411:2546: punaraparaṃ kulaputra sa mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purata āha - “eṣaiva me bhadanta bhagavan praṇidhiryāvadevāhamanuttarāyāṃ bodhicaryāyāṃ caramāṇo yān sattvānahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayeyaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāmantaśo vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi kuśalamūle niyojayeyaṃ;
S04n411:2547: yāvadbodhiparyantena caryāṃ caramāṇo na tān sattvāṃstribhiryānairavaivartikabhūmau sthāpayeyamantaśa ekasattvamapi,
S04n411:2548: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04n411:2550: anuttarajñānapratilabdhaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan ye me sattvāḥ śāsane raktakāṣāyaprāvṛtā bhaveyuḥ;
S04n411:2551: yadi vā mūlāpattimāpannāḥ syuryadi vā dṛṣṭivyasanaṃ saṃpratipannāḥ syuryadi vā triṣu ratneṣu skhalitāḥ sāparādhā bhaveyurbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā ya ekakṣaṇamapi mama sakāśe śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ vā gauravacittaṃ votpādayeyurdharme vā saṅghe vā gauravacittamutpādayeyuḥ;
S04n411:2552: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃstān sattvāṃstribhiryānairavaivartikāṃ na vyākuryāmantaśa ekasattvamapi riṃceyurvisaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuryāvan mā cāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ |
S04n411:2553: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan devamanuṣyasatkṛtaṃ gurukṛtaṃ mānitaṃ pūjitaṃ raktakāṣāyacīvaraṃ bhavet |
S04n411:2554: sahadarśanena sattvāḥ kāṣāyakaṇṭhāstribhiryānairavaivartikā bhaveyurye sattvāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitā annapānavirahitā yakṣadāridrā vāntaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ sattvā ye kāṣāyamabhilaṣeyurantaśaścaturaṅgulamapi,
S04n411:2556: ye sattvāḥ parasparaviruddhavairabahulāḥ parasparayuddhasaṃgrāmagatā vā devā vā yakṣā vā rākṣasā vā nāgā vā asurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā vā kuṃbhāṇḍā vā piśācā vā manuṣyā vā saṃgrāmagatāḥ kāṣāyamanusmareyuḥ,
S04n411:2557: te sattvāḥ karuṇācittā mṛducittā avairacittāḥ karmaṇyacittā bhaveyurye sattvāḥ saṃgrāme vā vivāde vā yuddhe vā kalahe vā kāṣāyakhaṇḍakaṃ rakṣārthaṃ pūjanārthaṃ gauravārthaṃ hareyuste sattvāḥ sadā aparājitā bhaveyuraskhalitā aviheṭhitā bhaveyuḥ,
S04n411:2558: svastinā tataḥ saṃgrāmādvā yuddhādvā kalahādvā vivādādvā parimucyeyuḥ |
S04n411:2559: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannebhiḥ pañcabhirāryaguṇai raktaṃ kāṣāyaṃ na samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
S04n411:2560: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣu,
S04n411:2562: mā cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ,
S04n411:2563: dharmā me saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā cāhaṃ śaktaḥ anyatīrthikāṃ parigṛhītuṃ |
S04n411:2564: ye ca bhadanta bhagavan mamābhisaṃbuddhasya yāvat parinirvṛtasya vā namaskāraṃ kariṣyanti,
S04n411:2568: sa ca punaḥ kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayitvā karatalena mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ parimārjayitvāha - “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa,
S04n411:2570: evameva te satpuruṣa pañcabhirāryaguṇai raktakāṣāyaṃ sattvānāmupajīvyaṃ bhaviṣyati“ |
S04n411:2571: sa bho punaḥ kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena vyākareṇena sādhukāraprāmodya prasādena tathāgatapuṇyadīrghāṅguliparicchāditena dakṣiṇena mṛdutaruṇakaratalasaṃsparśeṇa kumārabhūtaḥ saṃvṛto viṃśadvarṣasadṛśo jātipramāṇena |
S04n411:2572: punarapi kulaputra sarvāvatī sā parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣā prāñjalibhūtā tasthau,
S04n411:2573: mahākāruṇikasya pūjākarmaṇe udyuktāḥ puṣpairvādyairmahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vicitravarṇaiḥ ślokaistuṣṭāva ||
S04n411:2575: parāyaṇaṃ; sattvānāṃ duḥkhapramocanārthaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā te āśā paripūryatu vyākarotu ca bhagavānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau“ |
